### ※ 입금 유의사항 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차에 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있으니 유의사항을 꼼꼼하게 확인하세요 - 안내된 네트워크 (TREE-Ethereum)로만 입출금이 지원됩니다. 입금 전 반드시 네트워크를 확인하세요. - 업비트에서 거래지원하는 TREE의 컨트랙트 주소는 [0x77146784315Ba81904d654466968e3a7c196d1f3](https://etherscan.io/address/0x77146784315Ba81904d654466968e3a7c196d1f3)입니다. TREE 입출금 진행 시 컨트랙트 주소를 확인 바랍니다. - 트래블룰 이행을 위해, [입출금 가능 가상자산사업자 리스트](https://upbitcs.zendesk.com/hc/ko/articles/5048002559897)에 포함 되어있지 않은 거래소를 통해 업비트에 자산이 입금될 경우 반영이 불가하며, 반영 불가한 입금은 반환 절차까지 오랜 시간이 소요될 수 있습니다. - '본인 소유 확인'이 완료된 개인지갑 주소로만 입출금이 가능하며, 연동된 개인지갑을 통한 입금 건이더라도 해당 자산의 네트워크에 따라 입금 반환 처리를 해야 할 수 있습니다. - 출처가 불분명한 고액의 디지털 자산 입금 시, 자금 출처에 대한 소명이 요청될 수 있습니다. (이용약관 제17조 제8항) ### ※ 추가 디지털 자산 ~~TREE (트리하우스 Treehouse)~~ > 트리하우스(Treehouse)는 패널리스트 예측을 기반으로 산출된 기준 금리(DOR)를 참조하여 예치 자산을 전략적으로 운용하는 탈중앙화 고정 수익 프로토콜입니다. 사용자는 ETH 등 자산을 예치해 tAsset을 수령하고, 스마트컨트랙트를 통해 자동 운용되는 Vault 전략에 참여하여 수익을 분배받을 수 있습니다. TREE는 예측 참여, 쿼리 수수료 납부, 보상 분배, 거버넌스 등에서 사용됩니다. > 홈페이지 : [트리하우스 공식 홈페이지](https://www.treehouse.finance/) > X(구 트위터) : [트리하우스 공식 X](https://x.com/TreehouseFi) > 백서 : [트리하우스 공식 백서](https://docs.treehouse.finance/protocol) ✽ PC에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 새로고침 (F5) 후 확인 부탁드립니다. ✽ 업비트 App에서 해당 디지털 자산이 조회되지 않을 경우, 더보기 > 화면설정 > 코인정보 다시 받기를 클릭 후 확인 부탁드립니다.

투자 위험 안내
• 디지털 자산 투자는 투기적 수요 및 국내외 규제환경 변화 등에 따라 급격한 시세 변동에 노출될 수 있습니다. 본 디지털 자산의 투자 판단의 책임은 본인에게 있으며, 발생 가능한 손실도 투자자 본인에게 귀속됩니다. 프로젝트 홈페이지 및 공시 자료 등을 면밀히 참고하시어 디지털 자산의 특성을 충분히 인지하시고 신중하게 거래해 주시기를 당부해 드립니다.
• 디지털 자산 거래의 특성상 국내외 거래소간 시세 차이가 지속적으로 발생하고 있습니다. 반드시 디지털 자산 투자 전 글로벌 거래소와의 시세 차이에 유의하시기 바랍니다.
• 업비트는 안정된 거래 환경 조성을 위하여 최소 주문 금액 제한 등 다양한 조치를 취하고 있으나, 과열된 투자 환경에 따라 일부 회원님에게는 주문 안정화 메시지가 노출 될 수 있습니다. 이는 먼저 주문한 회원의 주문을 처리하고, 안정적인 서비스를 위한 불가피한 조치이므로 이 점 유의하시기 바랍니다.

※ 가상자산은 고위험 상품으로 투자금의 전부 또는 일부 손실을 초래할 수 있습니다.

column7: 欧易关于 XPL (Plasma) 盘前永续合约正式上线的公告
column9: 欧易关于 XPL (Plasma) 盘前永续合约正式上线的公告发布于 2025年8月28日阅读时长 2 分钟尊敬的欧易用户：欧易即将上线 XPL (Plasma) 盘前交易，具体时间安排如下：上线时间XPL/USDT 盘前交易开盘时间：2025 年 8 月 28 日下午 7:00 (UTC+8)前往欧易盘前交易项目介绍Plasma 是一个专为稳定币设计的 Layer 1 区块链，旨在提供高性能、可扩展性和安全性。英文全称：Plasma英文简称：XPL查看 Plasma 价格: https://www.okx.com/price/plasma-xpl盘前交易欧易盘前交易允许用户对尚未发布的币种进行永续合约交易。盘前交易永续合约本质是 USDT 本位永续合约，通常情况下会在新币种在币币交易市场上线后转换为标准永续合约。欧易推出盘前交易功能，旨在为用户提供一个可以参与新币种价格发现的安全可靠的平台。1. 盘前交易合约合约要素详情合约标的 (Underlying)XPL/USDT 指数 (指数取该合约的最新成交价)结算货币 (Settlement crypto)USDT合约面值 (Face value)10 XPL报价单位 (Price quotation)按照 1 XPL 的 USDT 价格进行报价最小变动价位 (Tick size)0.0001杠杆倍数 (Leverage)0.01 ~ 20 倍资金费率 (Funding rate)固定 0.03% 日费率资金费用结算周期 (Funding fee settlement interval)4 小时交易时间 (Trading hours)7×24 小时合约类型 (Contract type)永续合约转换时间 (Conversion time)盘前合约转换标准永续合约日期尚未确定，盘前交易合约通常会在该币种在币币市场上线后进行转换，转换时间确定后会另行公告通知除此之外，盘前交易市场与标准永续市场部分产品机制不同，梯度档位限仓规则如下（其他交易规则详情请参考盘前交易产品规则）:1. 梯度档位限仓规则档位最大可开仓量 (张数)维持保证金率初始保证金率最大杠杆倍数12,0002.00%5.00%10.0024,0003.00%6.66%6.6736,0004.00%8.00%5.004每档递增2,000每档递增 0.5%每档递增 0.5%档位对应的最高可开杠杆倍数准备交易充值您的 USDT 余额，为 XPL/USDT 盘前交易做好准备：充值 USDT 到您的欧易账户风险提示:目前项目方暂未确定最终发币计划，总发行量存在不确定性，若发行量变化可能会造成市场价格波动，用户需要自行关注市场信息，注意风险控制谨慎交易。盘前交易市场的价格由买卖双方的市场行为决定，该价格可能无法准确反映新币种实际发行的价格。欧易并不保证盘前永续合约的币种最终会在币币交易中上线。具体上币情况请关注欧易最新上币公告。欧易可随时自行决定暂停此类盘前合约交易。有关更多详细信息，请参阅欧易服务条款和风险&合规披露。欧易将持续为您提供更优秀的产品和更优质的服务！欧易团队2025 年 8 月 28 日

column7: 【首发上线】MEXC 将于创新区上线 Hemi (HEMI) 并支持闪兑服务
column9:
【首发上线】MEXC 将于创新区上线 Hemi (HEMI) 并支持闪兑服务
MEXC 创新区即将上线 Hemi (HEMI) 并开放 HEMI/USDT
及 HEMI/USDC 交易市场。此外，该币种 HEMI 也即将登陆 MEXC 闪兑，可与其他资产进行无缝、即时兑换。详情如下： Hemi (HEMI) 上线时间充值：已开启HEMI/USDT 创新区交易：2025年8月29日 12:00 (UTC+8)HEMI/USDC 创新区交易：2025年8月29日 12:20 (UTC+8)提币：2025年8月30日 12:00 (UTC+8)闪兑：2025年8月29日 13:00 (UTC+8)享受零手续费、即时兑换、固定汇率且无滑点的 MEXC 闪兑服务——轻松兑换币种，无需挂单或撮合。想了解更多详细信息与快速指南，请查看《什么是 MEXC 闪兑交易》。提示： 创新区部分项目价格波动较大，请留意风险。关于 Hemi (HEMI)
Hemi 是一个由比特币和以太坊提供支持的模块化网络，旨在实现卓越的扩容性、安全性和互操作性。其他项目将比特币和以太坊视为生态系统孤岛，限制了两者的潜力，而 Hemi 则将它们视为单一超级网络的组成部分。这为比特币 DeFi 等诸多领域开启了全新水平的可编程性、可移植性和潜力。Hemi 由 Jeff Garzik（前比特币核心开发者）和 Max Sanchez（Proof-of-Proof 共识协议的发明者）共同创立，并拥有一支由知名区块链工程师、战略合作伙伴和投资者组成的团队。
总供应量：10,000,000,000 HEMI
官方网站 | 合约地址 | X (推特) | 电报 | 白皮书
风险提示区块链初创项目在运营、底层技术和法律法规环境等方面可能存在极大的风险。参与项目投资需要具备丰富的技术和财经知识，以了解区块链初创项目的固有风险，包括任何代币发行对代币价格的影响。在您作出投资决策之前，我们建议您进行充分的尽职调查和评估或咨询专业顾问的建议。区块链项目相关数字资产的价格具有高波动性，可能会受到各种因素的影响而波动，参与项目投资可能会面临巨大甚至全额的投资损失。此外，由于项目底层技术或黑客攻击等原因，您可能会面临无法完全或部分提现项目相关数字资产的风险。在您决定是否投资此项目时，请仔细评估风险并根据自身风险承受能力做出决策。MEXC 对您的投资不承担任何担保或损失赔偿责任。

Hemi 是一个由比特币和以太坊提供支持的模块化网络，旨在实现卓越的扩容性、安全性和互操作性。其他项目将比特币和以太坊视为生态系统孤岛，限制了两者的潜力，而 Hemi 则将它们视为单一超级网络的组成部分。这为比特币 DeFi 等诸多领域开启了全新水平的可编程性、可移植性和潜力。Hemi 由 Jeff Garzik（前比特币核心开发者）和 Max Sanchez（Proof-of-Proof 共识协议的发明者）共同创立，并拥有一支由知名区块链工程师、战略合作伙伴和投资者组成的团队。
总供应量：10,000,000,000 HEMI

立即质押赚币
解锁方式：100% 解锁 Gate Launchpool 支持用户提前质押。在项目正式上线前，您即可提前质押资产，确保在项目开始挖矿后第一时间开始赚取奖励。 用户质押 ETH 并选择赎回后，将资产转入余币宝【7 天】定期产品，即可在原质押收益基础上叠加 50% 额外空投奖励。了解更多。 **奖励发放** 系统将每小时按用户质押资产占比对用户发放代币奖励到现货账户。 Gate Launchpool 常见问题及解答 如何参与：登录 Gate 账号，完成身份认证 - 进入【 Launchpool 】- 持有不低于 0.00003 ETH / 100 MISSION - 点击【质押】。 **项目基本信息** MissionPawsible 是一个集成在消息应用中的移动 GameFi 平台，首发于 Telegram，由全球最大迷因币之一 BabyDoge 的团队开发。它通过 $MP 代币驱动的 Web3 经济，重塑了经典的移动城市建设游戏，玩家通过游戏进度解锁季节性奖励和奖池。除了建造，玩家还可以在不离开聊天界面的情况下，与 AI 对手进行休闲竞技，或在私人房间挑战好友。凭借即时上手、引人入胜的机制和庞大的社区支持，MissionPawsible 将区块链游戏带到人们日常使用的平台上。 官网：https://missionpawsible.game/ **Gate Labs 投资公示** Gate Labs 未参与 MissionPawsible (MISSION) 投资。 **注意事项** 1. Gate Launchpool 是一个创新的质押空投平台，用户可通过质押 GT、BTC、ETH、USDT 或其他代币，每小时赚取热币新币空投，低门槛高年化，轻松捕获市场机遇。 2. 参与用户需先完成身份认证，以保障您的账户和资产安全。 3. 请参与时遵守相关活动规则，禁止任何作弊行为，任何作弊行为将导致取消获奖资格。 4. 如翻译版本与英文版本有任何差异，以英文版本为主。 5. Gate 拥有对本次活动的最终解释权。 6. 本活动与 Apple Inc. 无关。 7. 英国以及其他受限地区的使用者无法使用全部或部分服务（包括参与本活动、游戏或竞赛），有关受限地区的详细资讯请阅读 User Agreement。 **风险提示** 1. 区块链初创项目，仍处在初级阶段，项目的运营、项目的底层技术、法律法规环境等均可能存在极大的风险。 2. 了解区块链初创项目并对其固有风险进行评估需要掌握高级的技术和财经知识。 3. 受到技术、法律法规、市场和其他因素的影响， 您参与的项目价格可能会剧烈波动，价格可能会大幅降低或者升高。 4. 可能出现由于项目的底层技术或者 Gate 交易平台的原因， 您参与的项目可能无法全部或者部分提现。 5. 加密货币项目具有高风险。加密货币价格具有高波动性。项目方未设置保证金且不提供任何价格承诺和破发担保。请务必在完全了解风险并能承担风险的情况下参与，平台强烈提示风险，但无法对投资行为承担担保赔偿等责任。

立即质押赚币
解锁方式：100% 解锁 Gate Launchpool 支持用户提前质押。在项目正式上线前，您即可提前质押资产，确保在项目开始挖矿后第一时间开始赚取奖励。 用户质押 ETH 并选择赎回后，将资产转入余币宝【7 天】定期产品，即可在原质押收益基础上叠加 50% 额外空投奖励。了解更多。 **奖励发放** 系统将每小时按用户质押资产占比对用户发放代币奖励到现货账户。 Gate Launchpool 常见问题及解答 如何参与：登录 Gate 账号，完成身份认证 - 进入【 Launchpool 】- 持有不低于 0.00003 ETH / 100 MISSION - 点击【质押】。 **项目基本信息** MissionPawsible 是一个集成在消息应用中的移动 GameFi 平台，首发于 Telegram，由全球最大迷因币之一 BabyDoge 的团队开发。它通过 $MP 代币驱动的 Web3 经济，重塑了经典的移动城市建设游戏，玩家通过游戏进度解锁季节性奖励和奖池。除了建造，玩家还可以在不离开聊天界面的情况下，与 AI 对手进行休闲竞技，或在私人房间挑战好友。凭借即时上手、引人入胜的机制和庞大的社区支持，MissionPawsible 将区块链游戏带到人们日常使用的平台上。 官网：https://missionpawsible.game/ **Gate Labs 投资公示** Gate Labs 未参与 MissionPawsible (MISSION) 投资。 **注意事项** 1. Gate Launchpool 是一个创新的质押空投平台，用户可通过质押 GT、BTC、ETH、USDT 或其他代币，每小时赚取热币新币空投，低门槛高年化，轻松捕获市场机遇。 2. 参与用户需先完成身份认证，以保障您的账户和资产安全。 3. 请参与时遵守相关活动规则，禁止任何作弊行为，任何作弊行为将导致取消获奖资格。 4. 如翻译版本与英文版本有任何差异，以英文版本为主。 5. Gate 拥有对本次活动的最终解释权。 6. 本活动与 Apple Inc. 无关。 7. 英国以及其他受限地区的使用者无法使用全部或部分服务（包括参与本活动、游戏或竞赛），有关受限地区的详细资讯请阅读 User Agreement。 **风险提示** 1. 区块链初创项目，仍处在初级阶段，项目的运营、项目的底层技术、法律法规环境等均可能存在极大的风险。 2. 了解区块链初创项目并对其固有风险进行评估需要掌握高级的技术和财经知识。 3. 受到技术、法律法规、市场和其他因素的影响， 您参与的项目价格可能会剧烈波动，价格可能会大幅降低或者升高。 4. 可能出现由于项目的底层技术或者 Gate 交易平台的原因， 您参与的项目可能无法全部或者部分提现。 5. 加密货币项目具有高风险。加密货币价格具有高波动性。项目方未设置保证金且不提供任何价格承诺和破发担保。请务必在完全了解风险并能承担风险的情况下参与，平台强烈提示风险，但无法对投资行为承担担保赔偿等责任。

column9:

立即参与
**空投详情** **HODLer Airdrop 结束时间：2025 年 8 月 29 日 16:00 (UTC+8)** 空投总量：1,071,429 个 CELB 解锁方式：100% 解锁 **开启交易：2025 年 8 月 29 日 18:00 (UTC+8)** 上线交易对：CELB/USDT **参与要求** 完成身份认证；GT 持仓 ≧ 1 GT，可按照 GT 持仓快照量占比瓜分总奖池。每名用户本次活动参与上限为 1000 GT。 如何领空投：登录 Gate 账号，完成身份认证 → 进入 Launchpool，选择 HODLer Airdrop → 持有不低于 1 GT → 点击【去参与】。 HODLer Airdrop 常见问题及解答 **CeluvPlay (CELB) 介绍** CeluvPlay 是一个实时的 Web3 游戏和娱乐生态系统，赋能用户和创作者在充满活力的数字世界中创造、游戏和赚钱。该平台将超休闲手游、NFT、流媒体服务和独特的韩国娱乐 IP 整合到 AI 个性化体验中。CeluvPlay 拥有超过 24.4 万名社区成员、超过 20 万个已连接的钱包以及不断增长的用户群，并已在 BSC 和 Polygon 上线。它提供“创造赚钱”的机会、动态 NFT 以及无需钱包即可上手的体验，从而降低 Web2 用户的门槛。在 DWF Labs、Chainlink Build 和 GSR 等合作伙伴的支持下，CeluvPlay 正在连接 Web2 和 Web3 娱乐，以促进全球应用。 代币英文全称：CELB 代币中文全称：N/A 代币符号：CELB 代币总量：5,000,000,000 代币类型：BEP-20 合约地址：https://bscscan.com/token/0xda67fbf4e6fa4bb78f62533b7264e1b13295fdf3 代币分配比例及解锁规则： 私募轮 15%：TGE 解锁 0%，4 个月锁仓，10 个月线性解锁 团队 8%：TGE 解锁 0%，12 个月锁仓，12 个月线性解锁 顾问及合作伙伴 4%：TGE 解锁 0%，12 个月锁仓，12 个月线性解锁 去中心化交易所空投 5%：TGE 解锁 2.5%，按活动分配（无固定解锁） 去中心化交易所市场推广 1%：TGE 解锁 1%，按活动分配（无固定解锁） 战略合作伙伴 6%：TGE 解锁 0%，16 个月锁仓，24 个月线性解锁 市场推广/流动性 11%：TGE 解锁 100% 运营 5%：TGE 解锁 20%，16 个月锁仓，24 个月线性解锁月 生态系统 45%：TGE 解锁 0.8%，1 个月解锁，72 个月线性解锁 项目官网：https://www.celuvplay.io 白皮书：https://celuvplay.gitbook.io/celuvplay **Gate Labs 投资公示** Gate Labs 未参与 CeluvPlay (CELB) 投资。 **注意事项** 1. GT (GateToken) 是 Gate 交易平台唯一平台币，同时也是 GateChain 公链主网原生资产。持仓 GT 立即获取免费空投：https://www.gate.com/zh/trade/GT_USDT 2. 参与用户需先完成身份认证，以保障您的账户和资产安全。 3. 请参与时遵守相关活动规则，禁止任何作弊行为，任何作弊行为将导致取消获奖资格。 4. 如翻译版本与英文版本有任何差异，以英文版本为主。 5. Gate 拥有对本次活动的最终解释权。 6. 英国以及其他受限地区的使用者无法使用全部或部分服务（包括参与本活动、游戏或竞赛），有关受限地区的详细资讯请阅读 User Agreement 。 **风险提示** 1. HODLer Airdrop 项目为区块链初创项目，仍处在初级阶段，项目的运营、项目的底层技术、法律法规环境等均可能存在极大的风险。 2. 了解区块链初创项目并对其固有风险进行评估需要掌握高级的技术和财经知识。 3. 受到技术、法律法规、市场和其他因素的影响，您参与的项目价格可能会剧烈波动，价格可能会大幅降低或者升高。 4. 加密货币项目具有高风险。加密货币价格具有高波动性。 5. 项目方未设置保证金且不提供任何价格承诺和破发担保。请务必在完全了解风险并能承担风险的情况下参与，平台强烈提示风险，但无法对投资行为承担担保赔偿等责任。

HODLer Airdrop 项目为区块链初创项目，仍处在初级阶段，项目的运营、项目的底层技术、法律法规环境等均可能存在极大的风险。 2. 了解区块链初创项目并对其固有风险进行评估需要掌握高级的技术和财经知识。 3. 受到技术、法律法规、市场和其他因素的影响，您参与的项目价格可能会剧烈波动，价格可能会大幅降低或者升高。 4. 加密货币项目具有高风险。加密货币价格具有高波动性。 5. 项目方未设置保证金且不提供任何价格承诺和破发担保。请务必在完全了解风险并能承担风险的情况下参与，平台强烈提示风险，但无法对投资行为承担担保赔偿等责任。

column7: Upcoming Listing: BloFin to List YURU for Spot Trading
column9: Dear BloFin users, To extend the range of trading options available on BloFin Spot and improve users' spot trading experience, BloFin will soon list $YURU (YURU COIN) on our spot trading markets. Stay tuned! About YURU:YURU COIN is a Solana-based utility meme token launched in February 2025 in Japan. It is derived from the popular national mascot competition, the Yuru-Chara Grand Prix, which has historically attracted millions of participants and votes across Japan. The project aims to revitalize local communities by combining traditional mascot culture with decentralized technology, including NFTs, on-chain voting, and gamified incentives.Designed as the core digital asset for the upcoming “Yuruverse 2025” movement, YURU COIN grants holders various benefits such as exclusive voting rights in character competitions, redemption of mascot-themed merchandise, early access to offline and metaverse events, and airdrop eligibility. These features are intended to create real-world and digital engagement around regional identity and community pride.YURU COIN is currently traded on Jupiter DEX and B2Z Exchange, and is supported by a community of over 2,000 token holders. The project has ongoing initiatives to expand partnerships with municipalities, event organizers, and digital platforms to broaden the impact of Yuru-Chara culture both in Japan and globally. The token also supports burn mechanics and community-driven governance initiatives through DAO mechanisms under development.X LinkOfficial Website Further Reading:BloFin Spot Trading FeeBloFin Spot Trading Guide To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the app from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 28, 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: Camp Network (CAMP) Gets Listed on Bitunix!
column9:
Camp Network (CAMP) is getting listed on Bitunix. The supported trading pair will be CAMP/USDT on the spot market.
Deposit & Withdrawal
Deposits Effective Immediately
Withdrawal: 10:00 on August 28, 2025 (UTC)
Spot Trading
Spot trading for CAMP/USDT will start at 10:00 on August 28, 2025 (UTC).
Project Introduction
Camp Network (CAMP)
Camp Network is a purpose-built Layer-1 blockchain for powering AI agents trained on provenance-backed, user-owned IP.
Camp's Autonomous IP Layer enables anyone to tokenize IP — music, images, videos, even personal data — and register it onchain for AI training, remixing, and monetization.
Its architecture prioritizes gasless IP registration and royalty distribution, and supports isolated execution environments tailored for agent-based workflows and automated licensing. Developers can launch dedicated app chains with isolated blockspace and compute, offering the flexibility and scalability needed for high-performance workloads.
Official Website: https://www.campnetwork.xyz/
Blockchain Explorer: https://etherscan.io/token/0x84EAac1B2dc3f84D92Ff84c3ec205B1FA74671fC
Regards,
Bitunix Team
August 28, 2025
Join Bitunix Community:
X: https://X.com/bitunixofficial
Telegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobal
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunix
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial
*Risk Warning:
The cryptocurrency market is available worldwide 24 x 7 for trading with no market close or open times. Please do your own risk assessment when deciding how to invest in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to screen all projects before they come to market. However, even with the best due diligence, there are still possible risks when investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses. Terms, conditions, and regional restrictions may apply.

column7: Hemi (HEMI) Coin Gets Listed on BingX Spot
column9: Dear Users, BingX Spot will be listing Hemi (HEMI). Details are as follows: • Trading Pair(s): HEMI/USDT • HEMI Deposit Time: 2025-08-28, 08:00:00 (UTC+0) • HEMI Trading Time: 2025-08-29, 04:00:00 (UTC+0) • HEMI Withdrawal Time: 2025-08-30, 04:00:00 (UTC+0) Supported network for the aforementioned asset include: BEP20 What is HEMI? The Hemi Network is a modular Layer-2 protocol for superior scaling, security, and interoperability, powered by Bitcoin and Ethereum. Whereas other projects approach Bitcoin and Ethereum as ecosystem silos, Hemi views them as components of a single supernetwork. This unlocks new levels of programmability, portability, and potential. At Hemi's core: the Hemi Virtual Machine (hVM), which incorporates a full Bitcoin node within an Ethereum Virtual Machine. Combined with the Hemi Bitcoin Kit (hBK), developers have a familiar yet powerful platform for creating Hemi decentralized applications (hApps). Investment Risk Warning: Cryptocurrencies are highly volatile and subject to various risks, including market, project, technical and compliance-related uncertainties. Therefore, you may experience potential investment losses due to high volatility and various risks associated. Exercise caution, stay informed on the potential risks and invest prudently. BingX remains committed to providing an enhanced trading experience and services. Thank you for your continued support and understanding. Note: 1. Please make sure that the selected chain or network on BingX is consistent with the platform you're performing the withdrawal or deposit to avoid unnecessary losses. 2. The platform will automatically adjust the relevant parameter limits for spot trading based on market liquidity. If you have any questions, please contact our 24/7 online support. 3. The listing time specified in the announcement is for reference only. We will open the trading service once the deposit requirement for the above asset is met. The actual opening time shall prevail. column9: Dear Users, BingX Spot will be listing Cronos (CRO). Cronos POS Chain is a blockchain application built using Cosmos SDK and Tendermint, intended as a backbone for some of the existing and future Cronos ecosystem. Cronos is the EVM-compatible chain developed by Crypto.org. It aims to massively scale the Chain DeFi ecosystem, giving developers the ability to quickly port apps from Ethereum and other EVM-compatible chains. column7: MISSION PAWSIBLE (MISSION) Coin Gets Listed on BingX Spot [Global Debut]
column9: Dear Users, BingX Spot will be listing MISSION PAWSIBLE (MISSION). Details are as follows: • Trading Pair(s): MISSION/USDT • MISSION Deposit Time: 2025-08-28, 11:00:00 (UTC+0) • MISSION Trading Time: 2025-08-29, 11:00:00 (UTC+0) • MISSION Withdrawal Time: 2025-08-30, 11:00:00 (UTC+0) Supported network for the aforementioned asset include: TON What is MISSION? MissionPawsible is a mobile GameFi platform seamlessly integrated into messaging apps, starting with Telegram, developed by the team behind BabyDoge — one of the world’s largest memecoins. It reimagines the classic mobile city builder through a Web3 economy powered by the $MP token, where progress unlocks seasonal rewards and prize pools. Beyond building, users can compete in casual games against AI agents or challenge friends in private rooms — all without leaving chat. With instant onboarding, engaging mechanics, and access to a massive community, MissionPawsible brings blockchain gaming to the platforms people already use every day. column7: 【首发上线】MEXC 将于创新区上线 SecondLive (LIVE) 并支持闪兑服务
column9:
【首发上线】MEXC 将于创新区上线 SecondLive (LIVE) 并支持闪兑服务
MEXC 创新区即将上线 SecondLive (LIVE) 并开放 LIVE/USDT 交易市场。此外，该币种也即将登陆 MEXC 闪兑，可与其他资产进行无缝、即时兑换。详情如下：SecondLive (LIVE) 上线时间充值：已开启LIVE/USDT 创新区交易：2025年8月28日 19:00 (UTC+8)提币：2025年8月29日 19:00 (UTC+8)闪兑：2025年8月28日 20:00 (UTC+8)享受零手续费、即时兑换、固定汇率且无滑点的 MEXC 闪兑服务——轻松兑换币种，无需挂单或撮合。想了解更多详细信息与快速指南，请查看《什么是 MEXC 闪兑交易》。
提示： 创新区部分项目价格波动较大，请留意风险。关于 SecondLive (LIVE)SecondLive 是全球首个由 AI 驱动、可自我进化的世界建模平台，结合 AI 智能体、AIGC 工具套件与双代币经济，赋能使用者、品牌与开发者，在多条链（Ethereum、BNB、Arbitrum、Polygon、TON）上创建沉浸式空间、虚拟化身与互动场景。其核心工具包括 Gobetti（可穿戴 NFT 编辑器）、Calzone（文字生成 3D 工具）以及智慧 AI 智能体，让任何人都能构建并不断进化动态数位世界。总供应量：1,000,000,000 LIVE
官方网站 | 合约地址 | X (推特) | 电报 | 白皮书
风险提示区块链初创项目在运营、底层技术和法律法规环境等方面可能存在极大的风险。参与项目投资需要具备丰富的技术和财经知识，以了解区块链初创项目的固有风险，包括任何代币发行对代币价格的影响。在您作出投资决策之前，我们建议您进行充分的尽职调查和评估或咨询专业顾问的建议。 区块链项目相关数字资产的价格具有高波动性，可能会受到各种因素的影响而波动，参与项目投资可能会面临巨大甚至全额的投资损失。此外，由于项目底层技术或黑客攻击等原因，您可能会面临无法完全或部分提现项目相关数字资产的风险。在您决定是否投资此项目时，请仔细评估风险并根据自身风险承受能力做出决策。 MEXC 对您的投资不承担任何担保或损失赔偿责任。

column7: 【全球首发】SecondLive (LIVE) U本位合约将于 2025年8月28日 19:10 (UTC+8) 上线
column9:
【全球首发】SecondLive (LIVE) U本位合约将于 2025年8月28日 19:10 (UTC+8) 上线

column7: Initial Listing:  Gate to List SecondLive (LIVE) Spot Trading and Launch Launchpool
column9:
首发上线：Gate 将上线 SecondLive (LIVE) 现货交易并开启 Launchpool [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 28 日 19:00 (UTC+8) 首发上线 SecondLive (LIVE) 现货交易并开启第 302 期 Launchpool。用户质押 USDT、LIVE 即可免费瓜分 200,000 LIVE 代币，每小时领取空投奖励，新用户参与质押可获得 100 USDT 仓位体验券，先到先得。 **SecondLive (LIVE) 现货交易** **开始时间：2025 年 8 月 28 日 19:00 (UTC+8)** LIVE 充值地址：https://www.gate.com/zh/myaccount/deposit/LIVE LIVE 交易地址：https://www.gate.com/zh/trade/LIVE_USDT LIVE 合约地址：https://bscscan.com/token/0xdc9df5b6fb6a13ae1c9ff8b749cd5c95fbb060e1 **空投详情** **挖矿时间：2025 年 8 月 28 日 19:00 - 2025 年 9 月 4 日 19:00 (UTC+8)** 挖矿总量：200,000 LIVE ![](https://gimg2.gateimg.com/image/00000_20250827_155457_d6d60505244d391859e7905caf9d2c4b.png)
立即质押赚币
解锁方式：100% 解锁 Gate Launchpool 支持用户提前质押。在项目正式上线前，您即可提前质押资产，确保在项目开始挖矿后第一时间开始赚取奖励。 用户选择质押资金赎回后转入余币宝【7 天】定期产品，即可在原质押收益基础上叠加额外空投奖励。了解更多。 **奖励发放** 系统将每小时按用户质押资产占比对用户发放代币奖励到现货账户。 Gate Launchpool 常见问题及解答 **新用户专属质押池参与要求：仅限在 2025 年 8 月 26 日 08:00 (UTC+8) 之后注册的新用户参加。** 如何参与：登录 Gate 账号，完成 身份认证 - 进入【Launchpool】- 持有不低于 0.1 USDT / 1 LIVE - 点击【质押】。 **USDT 新手池专属福利：质押赢取 100 USDT 仓位体验券** 用户参与 USDT 新手池只需保持连续质押时长不低于 48 小时且平均有效质押金额不低于 100 USDT，即可获得 100 USDT 仓位体验券奖励。平均有效质押金额将根据连续质押期间实际质押和赎回情况计算得出。 共 3,000 个名额，先到先得。 **项目基本信息** SecondLive——全球首个 AI 驱动的自进化世界建模平台。 SecondLive 开创了首个由 AI 驱动、可自我进化的数字宇宙，融合 AI 智能体、AIGC 工具与区块链技术，赋能用户、品牌与开发者创建沉浸式空间与虚拟形象。平台依托 Gobetti、Calzone 等工具与双代币经济体系，已吸引 470 万用户参与，并获得多家顶级投资机构的强力支持。SecondLive 连接 Web2 的创意与 Web3 的智能，正将应用场景不断拓展至娱乐、教育与仿真等领域。 官网：https://secondlive.world/ **Gate Labs 投资公示** Gate Labs 未参与 SecondLive (LIVE) 投资。 **注意事项** 1. Gate Launchpool 是一个创新的质押空投平台，用户可通过质押 GT、BTC、ETH、USDT 或其他代币，每小时赚取热币新币空投，低门槛高年化，轻松捕获市场机遇。 2. USDT 新手池专属福利将以仓位体验券的形式发放，满足条件的用户将在达标后 14 个工作日内收到空投。连续质押期间允许部分赎回，全部赎回将重新计算连续质押周期；达标后赎回不影响奖励发放。 3. 参与用户需先完成 身份认证，以保障您的账户和资产安全。 4. 请参与时遵守相关活动规则，禁止任何作弊行为，任何作弊行为将导致取消获奖资格。 5. 如翻译版本与英文版本有任何差异，以英文版本为主。 6. 立即质押赚币
解锁方式：100% 解锁 Gate Launchpool 支持用户提前质押。在项目正式上线前，您即可提前质押资产，确保在项目开始挖矿后第一时间开始赚取奖励。 用户选择质押资金赎回后转入余币宝【7 天】定期产品，即可在原质押收益基础上叠加额外空投奖励。了解更多。 **奖励发放** 系统将每小时按用户质押资产占比对用户发放代币奖励到现货账户。 Gate Launchpool 常见问题及解答 **新用户专属质押池参与要求：仅限在 2025 年 8 月 26 日 08:00 (UTC+8) 之后注册的新用户参加。** 如何参与：登录 Gate 账号，完成 身份认证 - 进入【Launchpool】- 持有不低于 0.1 USDT / 1 LIVE - 点击【质押】。 **USDT 新手池专属福利：质押赢取 100 USDT 仓位体验券** 用户参与 USDT 新手池只需保持连续质押时长不低于 48 小时且平均有效质押金额不低于 100 USDT，即可获得 100 USDT 仓位体验券奖励。平均有效质押金额将根据连续质押期间实际质押和赎回情况计算得出。 共 3,000 个名额，先到先得。 **项目基本信息** SecondLive——全球首个 AI 驱动的自进化世界建模平台。 SecondLive 开创了首个由 AI 驱动、可自我进化的数字宇宙，融合 AI 智能体、AIGC 工具与区块链技术，赋能用户、品牌与开发者创建沉浸式空间与虚拟形象。平台依托 Gobetti、Calzone 等工具与双代币经济体系，已吸引 470 万用户参与，并获得多家顶级投资机构的强力支持。SecondLive 连接 Web2 的创意与 Web3 的智能，正将应用场景不断拓展至娱乐、教育与仿真等领域。 官网：https://secondlive.world/ **Gate Labs 投资公示** Gate Labs 未参与 SecondLive (LIVE) 投资。 **注意事项** 1. column7: Initial Listing: Gate to Support CAMP, BTR for Futures Trading, Margin Loans, Bots, Copy, Convert, a...
column9:
首发上线：Gate 将支持 CAMP、BTR 合约交易、杠杆借贷交易、交易机器人、跟单、闪兑、定投功能 [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE 为了提供更丰富的交易选择，Gate 将按以下时间线上线 Bitlayer (BTR)、Camp Network (CAMP) 合约交易、杠杆借贷交易、交易机器人、跟单、闪兑、定投功能，期待您的体验。 **合约** Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 27日 17:10 (UTC+8) 首发上线 CAMP 永续合约实盘交易（USDT 结算），支持 1 - 20 倍杠杆。 CAMP 永续合约实盘交易链接：https://www.gate.com/zh/futures/USDT/CAMP_USDT Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 27 日 18:30 (UTC+8) 首发上线 BTR 永续合约实盘交易（USDT 结算），支持 1 - 20 倍杠杆。 BTR 永续合约实盘交易链接：https://www.gate.com/zh/futures/USDT/BTR_USDT **注：** - 上述永续合约将在上线后 1 小时内开放跟单交易和交易机器人服务。 - 关于上线时间：若前期价格波动较大，合约上线时间可能会延后，根据实际情况调整具体上线时间。 - 关于交易参数调整：为防范市场风险、优化用户交易体验，Gate 将根据实际情况，适时调整资金费率、最小变动价位、最大杠杆、风险限额及维持保证金等交易参数。 **杠杆借贷交易** Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 27 日 17:10 (UTC+8) 新增 CAMP 统一账户借贷、逐仓杠杆交易对，并同步上线 CAMP 余币宝理财、活期抵押借贷、定期抵押借贷功能。 Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 27 日 19:00 (UTC+8) 新增 BTR 统一账户借贷、逐仓杠杆交易对，并同步上线 BTR 余币宝理财、活期抵押借贷、定期抵押借贷功能。 **闪兑** Gate 将于 CAMP 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 CAMP 闪兑功能，用户可将 CAMP 兑换成 USDT 或闪兑支持的其他代币。 Gate 将于 BTR 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 BTR 闪兑功能，用户可将 BTR 兑换成 USDT 或闪兑支持的其他代币。 **定投** Gate 将于 CAMP 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 CAMP 定投功能，支持每小时、每天等不同定投周期。 Gate 将于 BTR 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 BTR 定投功能，支持每小时、每天等不同定投周期。
Gate 团队 2025 年 8 月 27 日 **加密货币之门** 安全、快捷、轻松交易超过 3,500 种加密货币 **立即行动** [注册账户](https://www.gate.com/signup)，最高可领 $10,000 迎新奖励 [邀请他人注册](https://www.gate.com/referral)，可获 40% 佣金 **关注官方渠道** [访问 Gate 官网](https://www.gate.com/) [下载 Gate App | 电脑端](https://www.gate.com/mobileapp) [关注 X (Twitter)](https://x.com/Gate_zh)，获取最新福利 [加入 Telegram 社群](https://t.me/gate_zh)，讨论热点话题 [进入全球社区](https://www.gate.com/community)，获取最新资讯 **透明度保障** [查看 100% 储备金证明](https://www.gate.com/proof-of-reserves)

首发上线：Gate 将支持 CAMP、BTR 合约交易、杠杆借贷交易、交易机器人、跟单、闪兑、定投功能 [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE 为了提供更丰富的交易选择，Gate 将按以下时间线上线 Bitlayer (BTR)、Camp Network (CAMP) 合约交易、杠杆借贷交易、交易机器人、跟单、闪兑、定投功能，期待您的体验。 **合约** Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 27日 17:10 (UTC+8) 首发上线 CAMP 永续合约实盘交易（USDT 结算），支持 1 - 20 倍杠杆。 CAMP 永续合约实盘交易链接：https://www.gate.com/zh/futures/USDT/CAMP_USDT Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 27 日 18:30 (UTC+8) 首发上线 BTR 永续合约实盘交易（USDT 结算），支持 1 - 20 倍杠杆。 BTR 永续合约实盘交易链接：https://www.gate.com/zh/futures/USDT/BTR_USDT **注：** - 上述永续合约将在上线后 1 小时内开放跟单交易和交易机器人服务。 - 关于上线时间：若前期价格波动较大，合约上线时间可能会延后，根据实际情况调整具体上线时间。 - 关于交易参数调整：为防范市场风险、优化用户交易体验，Gate 将根据实际情况，适时调整资金费率、最小变动价位、最大杠杆、风险限额及维持保证金等交易参数。 **杠杆借贷交易** Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 27 日 17:10 (UTC+8) 新增 CAMP 统一账户借贷、逐仓杠杆交易对，并同步上线 CAMP 余币宝理财、活期抵押借贷、定期抵押借贷功能。 Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 27 日 19:00 (UTC+8) 新增 BTR 统一账户借贷、逐仓杠杆交易对，并同步上线 BTR 余币宝理财、活期抵押借贷、定期抵押借贷功能。 **闪兑** Gate 将于 CAMP 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 CAMP 闪兑功能，用户可将 CAMP 兑换成 USDT 或闪兑支持的其他代币。 Gate 将于 BTR 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 BTR 闪兑功能，用户可将 BTR 兑换成 USDT 或闪兑支持的其他代币。 **定投** Gate 将于 CAMP 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 CAMP 定投功能，支持每小时、每天等不同定投周期。 Gate 将于 BTR 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 BTR 定投功能，支持每小时、每天等不同定投周期。

column7: CoinEx Will Delist CHO, EVER, KP3R, CONVO, PIP, PUFF, ORA, METAV, FLX, BUCKAZOIDS, KITTY and MSTAR
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide better investment options for global users, CoinEx will conduct regular reviews on all cryptos listed on our platform according to the Delisting Criteria and will delist the ones that fail to meet our standards. When conducting a review, CoinEx will comprehensively consider many factors (including but not limited to community construction and operation factors, technology development factors, transaction volume, liquidity, etc.), and make delisting decisions prudently. Therefore, we have decided to start the delisting process of the following cryptos on Aug 27, 2025. The details are as follows.Delisted CryptosCHO, EVER, KP3R, CONVO, PIP, PUFF, ORA, METAV, FLX, BUCKAZOIDS, KITTY, MSTAR Delisted PairsCHO/USDT, EVER/USDT, KP3R/USDT, CONVO/USDT, PIP/USDT, PUFF/USDT, ORA/USDT, METAV/USDT, FLX/USDT, BUCKAZOIDS/USDT, KITTY/USDT, MSTAR/USDT Service Termination1. Deposit of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Sep 03, 2025 (UTC)2. Trading of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Sep 03, 2025 (UTC)3. Withdrawal of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Dec 03, 2025 (UTC) Notes1. Users who have unexecuted orders related to the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please cancel them in advance. If it fails, cancellations will be made automatically by the order system. The refunded assets can be checked in your account.2. For liquidity providers of the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please withdraw the liquidity in advance. If the withdrawal is not made after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the withdrawal and the relevant assets will be returned to your Spot account.3. For users who are executing trading strategies, please cancel the strategies in advance. If the strategies are not canceled after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the cancellations.4. Deposit, withdrawal, and trading of the above cryptos will be terminated precisely as scheduled, and these cryptos will no longer be available for deposit, withdrawal, or trading after delisting.5. For holders of the to-be-delisted cryptos, please make sure to complete the withdrawal or asset replacement (transaction/swap) before the delisting to avoid unnecessary losses.6. If your balance of the to-be-delisted crypto is less than the minimum order amount, you can convert your assets into CET via the Small Asset Converter. For more info, please refer to Convert Small Assets into CET. Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.CoinEx reserves the right of final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 27, 2025

When conducting a review, CoinEx will comprehensively consider many factors (including but not limited to community construction and operation factors, technology development factors, transaction volume, liquidity, etc.), and make delisting decisions prudently. Therefore, we have decided to start the delisting process of the following cryptos on Aug 27, 2025. The details are as follows.Delisted CryptosCHO, EVER, KP3R, CONVO, PIP, PUFF, ORA, METAV, FLX, BUCKAZOIDS, KITTY, MSTAR Delisted PairsCHO/USDT, EVER/USDT, KP3R/USDT, CONVO/USDT, PIP/USDT, PUFF/USDT, ORA/USDT, METAV/USDT, FLX/USDT, BUCKAZOIDS/USDT, KITTY/USDT, MSTAR/USDT Service Termination1. Deposit of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Sep 03, 2025 (UTC)2. Trading of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Sep 03, 2025 (UTC)3. Withdrawal of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Dec 03, 2025 (UTC) Notes1. Users who have unexecuted orders related to the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please cancel them in advance. If it fails, cancellations will be made automatically by the order system. The refunded assets can be checked in your account.2. For liquidity providers of the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please withdraw the liquidity in advance. If the withdrawal is not made after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the withdrawal and the relevant assets will be returned to your Spot account.3. For users who are executing trading strategies, please cancel the strategies in advance. If the strategies are not canceled after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the cancellations.4. Deposit, withdrawal, and trading of the above cryptos will be terminated precisely as scheduled, and these cryptos will no longer be available for deposit, withdrawal, or trading after delisting.5. For holders of the to-be-delisted cryptos, please make sure to complete the withdrawal or asset replacement (transaction/swap) before the delisting to avoid unnecessary losses.6. If your balance of the to-be-delisted crypto is less than the minimum order amount, you can convert your assets into CET via the Small Asset Converter. For more info, please refer to Convert Small Assets into CET. Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.CoinEx reserves the right of final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 27, 2025

column7: CoinEx Will List BTR (Bitlayer) on Aug 27, 2025
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide you with more trading options, after rigorous reviews, CoinEx will list BTR (Bitlayer) on Aug 27, 2025. The details are as follows: List Time1. Deposit: 11:00 on Aug 27 (UTC)2. Withdrawal: 11:00 on Aug 27 (UTC)3. Trading pair: BTR/USDT4. Opening method: Call Auction    a. Call Auction        11:00-11:05 Aug 27 (UTC)        Orders can be placed and canceled        11:05-11:10 Aug 27 (UTC)        Orders can be placed but cannot be canceled    b. Trading        11:10 Aug 27 (UTC)5. Service support: BTR/USDT supports AMM, Spot Grid, and Auto-Invest Plan. BTR (Bitlayer): https://www.btrscan.com/ About BTRBitlayer is a Bitcoin security equivalent Layer 2 based on the BitVM paradigm.Learn more about BTR>> About Automated Market Making (AMM)AMM is supported for the BTR/USDT market. CoinEx AMM allows every user to become a market maker. By adding liquidity to the liquidity pool, users can share 50% of the trading fees earned in this market. The fee dividends are calculated daily. Learn about AMM >> About Spot GridSpot Grid is supported for the BTR/USDT market. Spot Grid is a trading strategy suitable for volatile markets. It helps you capture profits in market fluctuations by automatically executing buy low and sell high within a certain market range 24 hours a day. Learn about Spot Grid >> About Auto-Invest PlanAuto-Invest Plan is supported for the BTR/USDT market. CoinEx Auto-Invest Plan is a trading strategy that helps you automatically accumulate crypto assets via pre-set investment and recurring cycles. It has the advantages of automatic execution, convenience, and friendly entry. With a minimum of 1 USDT, you can make stable investments and realize wealth growth. Learn about Auto-Invest Plan >> Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. CoinEx reserves the final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 27, 2025  · Invite friends to register and share up to 40% trading fee rebate. More free vouchers await you >>>· Learn about CoinEx’s latest coin listing info in the New Listing zone >>>· Join CoinEx official community to get the latest asset listing updates and unlock exclusive benefits >>>· Follow CoinEx Global Twitter to learn about the latest market trends and win gifts >>>

column7: BTRUSDT Perpetual Contract Listing: Enjoy 0 Maker Fees & 50% off Taker Fees!
column9: Dear BloFin Users, We are pleased to announce that the USDT-Margined perpetual contract for $BTR will be listed at 10:45 (UTC) on Aug 27, 2025. The updates will cover both the web and app interfaces. The details are as follows: BTRUSDT Perpetual:FeatureDetailsUnderlying AssetBTR（Bitlayer）Settlement AssetUSDTContract Size10 BTRPrice Quotation10 BTR value calculated in USDT equivalentTick Size0.00001Leverage1-50XFunding Fee Settlement Frequency Every 4 hoursTrading Hours24/7 The price limit rules of BTRUSDT perpetual trading are the same as those of other cryptos. Please refer to our Trading Guides for further details. Event: Trade BTRUSDT with 0 Maker Fees & 50% off Taker FeesTo celebrate the listing of the BTRUSDT trading pair on BloFin Futures, BloFin offers 0 Maker fees and 50% off Taker fees event for the first 48 hours for users when trading BTRUSDT, with Taker fees as low as 0.03%! To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the App from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 27, 2025 Find us on:X (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: BloFin Will List CAMP/USDT for Spot Trading (2025-08-27)
column9: Dear BloFin users, To extend the range of trading options available on BloFin Spot and improve users' trading experience, BloFin will list the $CAMP(Camp Network) token on our spot trading markets. The listing schedule is as follows:Deposits: 09:00 (UTC) on August 27, 2025Spot trading: 09:30 (UTC) on August 27, 2025Withdrawals: 09:30 (UTC) on August 28, 2025Further Reading:BloFin Spot Trading FeeBloFin Spot Trading Guide Please note:To prevent potential losses, please ensure the selected chain or network on BloFin matches the one used for your withdrawal or deposit.To align with market liquidity, BloFin may automatically adjust spot trading parameters. Please refer to the trading page for the most accurate information.The listing schedule in the announcement is for reference only. The actual deposit/ trading/ withdrawal time shall prevail. For any questions, please contact our online support. About ALKIMI:Camp Network is a purpose-built Layer-1 blockchain for powering AI agents trained on provenance-backed, user-owned IP.Camp's Autonomous IP Layer enables anyone to tokenize IP — music, images, videos, even personal data — and register it onchain for AI training, remixing, and monetization.X LinkOfficial Website To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the app from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support!BloFin TeamAugust 27 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

For any questions, please contact our online support. About ALKIMI:Camp Network is a purpose-built Layer-1 blockchain for powering AI agents trained on provenance-backed, user-owned IP.Camp's Autonomous IP Layer enables anyone to tokenize IP — music, images, videos, even personal data — and register it onchain for AI training, remixing, and monetization.X LinkOfficial Website To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the app from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support!BloFin TeamAugust 27 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: Access Protocol (ACS) Gets Listed on Bitunix!
column9:
Dear Bitunix Users,
Access Protocol (ACS) is getting listed on Bitunix. The supported trading pair will be ACS/USDT on the spot market.
Deposit & Withdrawal
Deposits Effective Immediately
Withdrawal: 08:00 on August 26, 2025 (UTC)
Spot Trading
Spot trading for ACS/USDT will start at 08:00 on August 26, 2025 (UTC).
Project Introduction
Access Protocol (ACS)
Access Protocol (ACS) redefines digital content monetization by leveraging blockchain technology. Built on Solana and Starknet, Access Protocol offers a Web3-native experience, enabling content creators to monetize their work through staking rather than traditional subscriptions. Users stake ACS tokens to gain access to premium content, creating a decentralized and innovative approach to content consumption.
Official Website: https://www.accessprotocol.co/en
Blockchain Explorer: https://solscan.io/token/5MAYDfq5yxtudAhtfyuMBuHZjgAbaS9tbEyEQYAhDS5y
Regards,
Bitunix Team
August 26, 2025
Join Bitunix Community:
X: https://X.com/bitunixofficial
Telegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobal
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunix
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial
*Risk Warning:
The cryptocurrency market is available worldwide 24 x 7 for trading with no market close or open times. Please do your own risk assessment when deciding how to invest in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to screen all projects before they come to market. However, even with the best due diligence, there are still possible risks when investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses. Terms, conditions, and regional restrictions may apply.

column7: [Initial Listing] Bitget Will List SecondLive (LIVE). Come and grab a share of 5,124,000 LIVE
column9:
[Initial Listing] Bitget Will List SecondLive (LIVE). Come and grab a share of 5,124,000 LIVE
We are thrilled to announce that SecondLive (LIVE) will be listed in the Innovation Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 28 August 2025, 11:00 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available: 29 August 2025, 12:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: LIVE/USDT
Activity 1: CandyBomb – Trade to share 2,000,000 LIVE
Promotion period: 28 August 2025,11:00  – 4 September 2025, 11:00 (UTC)
CandyBomb
Promotion details:
Total LIVE campaign pool
2,000,000 LIVE
LIVE Spot trading campaign pool * (New Users Only)
500,000 LIVE
LIVE Spot trading campaign pool * (Existing Users Only)
1,500,000 LIVE
How to participate:
1. Go to the CandyBomb page and use the Join button.
2. Bitget will start calculating your valid activity data upon successful join.
3. You will get candies based on your LIVE spot trading volume.
Activity 2: CandyBomb: Exclusive for Eligible Users — Trade to Share 2,500,000 LIVE!
Promotion period: 28 August 2025,11:00  – 4 September 2025, 11:00 (UTC)
CandyBomb
Promotion details:
Total LIVE Campaign Pool
2,500,000 LIVE
LIVE, BTC & DOGE trading campaign pool * (Eligible users only)
2,500,000 LIVE
Eligibility Criteria (Registration Requirements)
1. 7 days ≤ Registration time ≤ 30 days
2. Net deposit before first trade ≥ 100 USDT (or equivalent tokens)
3. First trade must be a spot trade
Activity 3: 𝕏 Giveaway - Follow to Share 312,000 LIVE
Promotion period: 28 August 2025,11:00 – 4 September 2025, 11:00 (UTC)
How to participate:
Follow Bitget and SecondLive on X.
Quote the giveaway post with the hashtag #LIVElistBitget and tag your friends.
Sign up, deposit or trade LIVE on Bitget
Fill out the form in the giveaway post.
🎁 Bonus: 600 qualified users will be randomly selected to equally share the campaign pool.
Activity 4: Community Campaign -  Win Your Share of 312,000 LIVE ！
Campaign Period: 28 August 2025,11:00  – 4 September 2025, 11:00 (UTC)
Complete 3 tasks below and win $10 - $20 LIVE airdrop:
Join both Bitget Telegram and BGB Holders Group
Sign up and make a net deposit of over 100 USDT
Complete a LIVE/USDT spot trade of any amount
🎁 Bonus: 600 qualified users will be randomly selected to share the campaign pool.
Introduction
SecondLive is pioneering the world’s first AI-driven, self-evolving world modeling platform, merging AI agents, AIGC toolkits, and blockchain to empower users, brands, and developers to build immersive digital spaces, avatars, and interactive scenarios.
With innovative tools such as Gobetti (wearable NFT editor) and Calzone (text-to-3D generator), anyone can create and evolve a dynamic AI-powered digital world. Spanning Ethereum, BNB Chain, Arbitrum, Polygon, and TON.
SecondLive has engaged over 4.7 million users worldwide through Web3 concerts and collaborations with global brands like SNK, Nexon, and Xiaoice. As the AI Social Nexus, SecondLive continues to bridge Web2 creativity and Web3 intelligence, unlocking new applications across entertainment, education, and simulation.
Contract Address (BEP20):
0xdc9df5b6fb6a13ae1c9ff8b749cd5c95fbb060e1

How to Buy LIVE on Bitget
Fee Schedule
Price & Market Data
Disclaimer
Cryptocurrencies are subject to high market risk and volatility despite high growth potential. Users are strongly advised to do their research as they invest at their own risk. Thank you for supporting Bitget!

column7: 币安理财、一键买币、闪兑、杠杆上线Dolomite（DOLO）
column9:
Binance Will Add Dolomite (DOLO) on Earn, Buy Crypto, Convert & Margin | Binance Announcements ,Binance News,DOLO
Buy CryptoMarketsTradeFuturesEarnSquareMoreLog InSign UpScan to Download App iOS & AndroidMore Download OptionsNew Cryptocurrency ListingLatest Binance NewsLatest ActivitiesNew Fiat ListingsDelistingMaintenance UpdatesAPI UpdatesCrypto AirdropSupport CenterAnnouncementNew Cryptocurrency ListingBinance... MarginBinance Will Add Dolomite (DOLO) on Earn, Buy Crypto, Convert & MarginPublished on 2025-08-27 23:30DOLO/USDC0.21+6.0970%This is a general announcement. Products and services referred to here may not be available in your region. Fellow Binancians,Binance is excited to announce that Dolomite (DOLO) will be added to Binance Simple Earn, "Buy Crypto", Binance Convert and Binance Margin at the respective dates and timings listed below.EarnDOLO Flexible Products will be listed on Binance Simple Earn at 2025-08-27 16:00 (UTC) and will be available for subscription.Notes:Dolomite (DOLO) is the project on the Binance HODLer Airdrops program, which rewards BNB holders with token airdrops based on historical snapshots of their BNB Simple Earn asset or BNB On-Chain Yields balances. Users can subscribe to BNB Simple Earn Products (Flexible or Locked Products) or BNB On-Chain Yields to automatically enjoy HODLer Airdrops rewards.Buy & Sell CryptoUsers can buy DOLO with VISA, MasterCard, Google Pay, Apple Pay, Revolut or buy and sell DOLO with their account balances on the “Buy Crypto” page, available within one hour of DOLO being listed on Binance Spot. ConvertUsers will be able to start trading DOLO against BTC, USDT, and any other tokens on Binance Convert at zero fees within one hour of DOLO being listed on Binance Spot. MarginBinance Margin will add DOLO as a new borrowable asset on Cross and Isolated Margin, as well as the DOLO/USDT and  DOLO/USDC pairs on Cross and Isolated Margin at 2025-08-27 16:00 (UTC).Notes: Please note that newly listed tokens tend to be volatile; users are encouraged to adopt stringent risk management strategies when trading such tokens.Please refer to Margin Data for a list of the most updated marginable assets and further information on specific limits, collateral ratio and rates.Guides & Related Materials:How to Buy Crypto with Credit/Debit CardHow to Use Binance ConvertHow to Use Short on Margin TradingHow to Use Long on Margin TradingNote: There may be discrepancies between this original content in English and any translated versions. Please refer to the original English version for the most accurate information, in case any discrepancies arise.Thank you for your support!Binance Team2025-08-27USDC is an e-money token issued by Circle Internet Financial Europe SAS (https://www.circle.com/). USDC’s whitepaper is available here. You may contact Circle using the following contact information: +33(1)59000130 and EEA-Customer-Support@circle.com. Holders of USDC have a legal claim against Circle SAS as the EU issuer of USDC. These holders are entitled to request redemption of their USDC from Circle SAS. MarginBinance Will Add Dolomite (DOLO) on Earn, Buy Crypto, Convert & MarginPublished on 2025-08-27 23:30DOLO/USDC0.21+6.0970%This is a general announcement. Products and services referred to here may not be available in your region. Fellow Binancians,Binance is excited to announce that Dolomite (DOLO) will be added to Binance Simple Earn, "Buy Crypto", Binance Convert and Binance Margin at the respective dates and timings listed below.EarnDOLO Flexible Products will be listed on Binance Simple Earn at 2025-08-27 16:00 (UTC) and will be available for subscription.Notes:Dolomite (DOLO) is the project on the Binance HODLer Airdrops program, which rewards BNB holders with token airdrops based on historical snapshots of their BNB Simple Earn asset or BNB On-Chain Yields balances. Users can subscribe to BNB Simple Earn Products (Flexible or Locked Products) or BNB On-Chain Yields to automatically enjoy HODLer Airdrops rewards.Buy & Sell CryptoUsers can buy DOLO with VISA, MasterCard, Google Pay, Apple Pay, Revolut or buy and sell DOLO with their account balances on the “Buy Crypto” page, available within one hour of DOLO being listed on Binance Spot. ConvertUsers will be able to start trading DOLO against BTC, USDT, and any other tokens on Binance Convert at zero fees within one hour of DOLO being listed on Binance Spot. MarginBinance Margin will add DOLO as a new borrowable asset on Cross and Isolated Margin, as well as the DOLO/USDT and  DOLO/USDC pairs on Cross and Isolated Margin at 2025-08-27 16:00 (UTC).Notes: Please note that newly listed tokens tend to be volatile; users are encouraged to adopt stringent risk management strategies when trading such tokens.Please refer to Margin Data for a list of the most updated marginable assets and further information on specific limits, collateral ratio and rates.Guides & Related Materials:How to Buy Crypto with Credit/Debit CardHow to Use Binance ConvertHow to Use Short on Margin TradingHow to Use Long on Margin TradingNote: There may be discrepancies between this original content in English and any translated versions. Please refer to the original English version for the most accurate information, in case any discrepancies arise.Thank you for your support!Binance Team2025-08-27USDC is an e-money token issued by Circle Internet Financial Europe SAS (https://www.circle.com/). USDC’s whitepaper is available here. You may contact Circle using the following contact information: +33(1)59000130 and EEA-Customer-Support@circle.com. Holders of USDC have a legal claim against Circle SAS as the EU issuer of USDC. These holders are entitled to request redemption of their USDC from Circle SAS. Such redemption will be made at any time and at par value.Trade on-the-go with Binance’s crypto trading app (iOS/Android)Find us on TelegramWhatsAppXFacebookInstagramDiscordBinance reserves the right in its sole discretion to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reasons without prior notice.Disclaimer: Digital asset prices are subject to high market risk and price volatility. USDC’s whitepaper is available here. These holders are entitled to request redemption of their USDC from Circle SAS. Buy CryptoMarketsTradeFuturesEarnSquareMoreLog InSign UpScan to Download App iOS & AndroidMore Download OptionsNew Cryptocurrency ListingLatest Binance NewsLatest ActivitiesNew Fiat ListingsDelistingMaintenance UpdatesAPI UpdatesCrypto AirdropSupport CenterAnnouncementNew Cryptocurrency ListingBinance... MarginBinance Will Add Dolomite (DOLO) on Earn, Buy Crypto, Convert & MarginPublished on 2025-08-27 23:30DOLO/USDC0.21+6.0970%This is a general announcement. Products and services referred to here may not be available in your region. Fellow Binancians,Binance is excited to announce that Dolomite (DOLO) will be added to Binance Simple Earn, "Buy Crypto", Binance Convert and Binance Margin at the respective dates and timings listed below.EarnDOLO Flexible Products will be listed on Binance Simple Earn at 2025-08-27 16:00 (UTC) and will be available for subscription.Notes:Dolomite (DOLO) is the project on the Binance HODLer Airdrops program, which rewards BNB holders with token airdrops based on historical snapshots of their BNB Simple Earn asset or BNB On-Chain Yields balances. Users can subscribe to BNB Simple Earn Products (Flexible or Locked Products) or BNB On-Chain Yields to automatically enjoy HODLer Airdrops rewards.Buy & Sell CryptoUsers can buy DOLO with VISA, MasterCard, Google Pay, Apple Pay, Revolut or buy and sell DOLO with their account balances on the “Buy Crypto” page, available within one hour of DOLO being listed on Binance Spot. ConvertUsers will be able to start trading DOLO against BTC, USDT, and any other tokens on Binance Convert at zero fees within one hour of DOLO being listed on Binance Spot. MarginBinance Margin will add DOLO as a new borrowable asset on Cross and Isolated Margin, as well as the DOLO/USDT and  DOLO/USDC pairs on Cross and Isolated Margin at 2025-08-27 16:00 (UTC).Notes: Please note that newly listed tokens tend to be volatile; users are encouraged to adopt stringent risk management strategies when trading such tokens.Please refer to Margin Data for a list of the most updated marginable assets and further information on specific limits, collateral ratio and rates.Guides & Related Materials:How to Buy Crypto with Credit/Debit CardHow to Use Binance ConvertHow to Use Short on Margin TradingHow to Use Long on Margin TradingNote: There may be discrepancies between this original content in English and any translated versions. Please refer to the original English version for the most accurate information, in case any discrepancies arise.Thank you for your support!Binance Team2025-08-27USDC is an e-money token issued by Circle Internet Financial Europe SAS (https://www.circle.com/). USDC’s whitepaper is available here. You may contact Circle using the following contact information: +33(1)59000130 and EEA-Customer-Support@circle.com. Holders of USDC have a legal claim against Circle SAS as the EU issuer of USDC. These holders are entitled to request redemption of their USDC from Circle SAS. Such redemption will be made at any time and at par value.Trade on-the-go with Binance’s crypto trading app (iOS/Android)Find us on TelegramWhatsAppXFacebookInstagramDiscordBinance reserves the right in its sole discretion to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reasons without prior notice.Disclaimer: Digital asset prices are subject to high market risk and price volatility. The value of your investment may go down or up, and you may not get back the amount invested. You are solely responsible for your investment decisions and Binance is not liable for any losses you may incur. Past performance is not a reliable predictor of future performance. You should only invest in products you are familiar with and where you understand the risks. You should carefully consider your investment experience, financial situation, investment objectives and risk tolerance and consult an independent financial adviser prior to making any investment. This material should not be construed as financial advice. column7: 币安Alpha和币安合约将上线Hemi (HEMI) (2025-08-29)
column9:
Hemi (HEMI) Will Be Available on Binance Alpha and Binance Futures (2025-08-29) | Binance Alpha,Binance Futures,Binance Announcements ,Binance News
Buy CryptoMarketsTradeFuturesEarnSquareMoreLog InSign UpScan to Download App iOS & AndroidMore Download OptionsNew Cryptocurrency ListingLatest Binance NewsLatest ActivitiesNew Fiat ListingsDelistingMaintenance UpdatesAPI UpdatesCrypto AirdropSupport CenterAnnouncementNew Cryptocurrency ListingHemi (H...-08-29)Hemi (HEMI) Will Be Available on Binance Alpha and Binance Futures (2025-08-29)Published on 2025-08-27 22:00This is a general announcement. Products and services referred to here may not be available in your region.Fellow Binancians,Binance is excited to announce that Hemi (HEMI) will open for trading on Binance Alpha starting 2025-08-29 04:00 (UTC). In addition, Binance Futures will launch HEMIUSDT Perpetual Contract with up to 50x leverage at 2025-08-29 04:30 (UTC).Binance is the first platform to feature and open trading for Hemi (HEMI) on Binance Alpha and Binance Futures. In celebration of this launch, there is a Booster Program token allocation for eligible Binance users who have participated with sufficient Alpha Points. Tokens acquired through participation in Booster Programs may be subject to a lock-up period immediately following the TGE. During this lock-up period, users will not be able to claim these tokens until the token’s project officially unlocks them. Users are responsible to understand and accept the risks associated with participating in Booster Programs, including but not limited to the inability to claim tokens during the lock-up period, market volatility, and project-specific risks.More details on the HEMIUSDT Perpetual Contract can be found in the table below:USDⓈ-M Perpetual ContractHEMIUSDTLaunch Time2025-08-29 04:30 (UTC)Underlying AssetHemi (HEMI)Project InformationHemi is the network that’s scaling Bitcoin beyond money.Settlement AssetUSDTTick SizeTo be updated 15 minutes before the launch timeCapped Funding Rate+2.00% / -2.00%Funding Fee Settlement FrequencyEvery Four HoursMaximum Leverage50xTrading Hours24/7Multi-Assets ModeSupportedPlease Note: Tick size details will be updated 15 minutes before the launch time. Please refer to this announcement for the most accurate and updated information.The aforementioned perpetual contract(s) will be included in Binance Futures New Listing Fee Promotion campaign;The aforementioned perpetual contract(s) will be made available for Futures Copy Trading within 24 hours of launch. For more information on available Futures Copy Trading contracts, please refer to this page.Based on market risk conditions, Binance may adjust the specifications of the aforementioned Futures contract(s) from time to time, which include the funding fee, tick size, maximum leverage, initial margin, and/or maintenance margin requirements.Multi-Assets Mode allows users to trade the aforementioned perpetual contract(s) across multiple margin assets, subject to the applicable haircuts. For example, when the Multi-Assets Mode is activated, users can use BTC as margin when trading the aforementioned perpetual contract(s). The aforementioned perpetual contract(s) are subject to the Binance Terms of Use and the Binance Futures Service Agreement.Futures and spot token listings are not correlated. A token listed on Binance Futures does not guarantee that it will be listed on Binance Spot.In case there is a discrepancy between this announcement and any Futures FAQ, please refer to this announcement for the most accurate and updated information.There may be discrepancies between this original content in English and any translated versions. Please refer to the original English version for the most accurate information, in case any discrepancies arise.Further Information:Trading Rules of USDⓈ-M Futures ContractsLeverage and Margin of USDⓈ-M Futures ContractsBinance Futures Fee StructureHow to Select Trading PairsFunding Rate HistoryMark Price and Price IndexMulti-Assets ModeThank you for your support!Binance Team2025-08-27Disclaimer: Binance Alpha features emerging digital assets which are not listed on the Binance Exchange. The labelling as an Alpha Asset do not imply that such asset will be listed on the Binance Exchange. You may lose all or part of what you invested. Please note that (i) Alpha Assets are exposed to increase price volatility, and therefore higher risks (ii) you are exposed to price slippage and blockchain fees (iii) Alpha Assets cannot be withdrawn from the Binance Exchange. Binance will not be responsible for any losses that you may incur arising from an investment in Binance Alpha Assets.Trade on-the-go with Binance’s crypto trading app (iOS/Android)Find us on TelegramWhatsAppXFacebookInstagramDiscordBinance reserves the right in its sole discretion to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reasons without prior notice.Disclaimer: In compliance with MiCA requirements, from 2024-06-30, unauthorized stablecoins are subject to certain restrictions for EEA users. For more information, please click here. Digital asset prices can be volatile. The value of your investment may go down or up and you may not get back the amount invested. You are solely responsible for your investment decisions and Binance is not liable for any losses you may incur. Futures trading, in particular, is subject to high market risk and price volatility. You may be called upon at short notice to make additional margin deposits or interest payments. If the required margin deposits or interest payments are not made within the prescribed time, your collateral may be liquidated without your consent. Moreover, you will remain liable for any resulting deficit in your account and interest charged on your account. All of your margin balance may be liquidated in the event of adverse price movement. Past performance is not a reliable predictor of future performance. Before trading, you should make an independent assessment of the appropriateness of the transaction in light of your own objectives and circumstances, including the risks and potential benefits. Consult your own advisers, where appropriate. This information should not be construed as financial or investment advice. To learn more about how to protect yourself, visit our Responsible Trading page. For more information, see our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.ShareRegister to get rewardsRegister Now - Get up to 100 USDT in trading fee rebate (for verified users)Register NowLatest ArticlesBinance column7: 币安Alpha和币安合约将上线Hemi (HEMI) (2025-08-29)
column9:
Hemi (HEMI) Will Be Available on Binance Alpha and Binance Futures (2025-08-29) | Binance Alpha,Binance Futures,Binance Announcements ,Binance News
Buy CryptoMarketsTradeFuturesEarnSquareMoreLog InSign UpScan to Download App iOS & AndroidMore Download OptionsNew Cryptocurrency ListingLatest Binance NewsLatest ActivitiesNew Fiat ListingsDelistingMaintenance UpdatesAPI UpdatesCrypto AirdropSupport CenterAnnouncementNew Cryptocurrency ListingHemi (H...-08-29)Hemi (HEMI) Will Be Available on Binance Alpha and Binance Futures (2025-08-29)Published on 2025-08-27 22:00This is a general announcement. Products and services referred to here may not be available in your region.Fellow Binancians,Binance is excited to announce that Hemi (HEMI) will open for trading on Binance Alpha starting 2025-08-29 04:00 (UTC). In addition, Binance Futures will launch HEMIUSDT Perpetual Contract with up to 50x leverage at 2025-08-29 04:30 (UTC).Binance is the first platform to feature and open trading for Hemi (HEMI) on Binance Alpha and Binance Futures. In celebration of this launch, there is a Booster Program token allocation for eligible Binance users who have participated with sufficient Alpha Points. Tokens acquired through participation in Booster Programs may be subject to a lock-up period immediately following the TGE. During this lock-up period, users will not be able to claim these tokens until the token’s project officially unlocks them. Users are responsible to understand and accept the risks associated with participating in Booster Programs, including but not limited to the inability to claim tokens during the lock-up period, market volatility, and project-specific risks.More details on the HEMIUSDT Perpetual Contract can be found in the table below:USDⓈ-M Perpetual ContractHEMIUSDTLaunch Time2025-08-29 04:30 (UTC)Underlying AssetHemi (HEMI)Project InformationHemi is the network that’s scaling Bitcoin beyond money.Settlement AssetUSDTTick SizeTo be updated 15 minutes before the launch timeCapped Funding Rate+2.00% / -2.00%Funding Fee Settlement FrequencyEvery Four HoursMaximum Leverage50xTrading Hours24/7Multi-Assets ModeSupportedPlease Note: Tick size details will be updated 15 minutes before the launch time. Please refer to this announcement for the most accurate and updated information.The aforementioned perpetual contract(s) will be included in Binance Futures New Listing Fee Promotion campaign;The aforementioned perpetual contract(s) will be made available for Futures Copy Trading within 24 hours of launch. For more information on available Futures Copy Trading contracts, please refer to this page.Based on market risk conditions, Binance may adjust the specifications of the aforementioned Futures contract(s) from time to time, which include the funding fee, tick size, maximum leverage, initial margin, and/or maintenance margin requirements.Multi-Assets Mode allows users to trade the aforementioned perpetual contract(s) across multiple margin assets, subject to the applicable haircuts. For example, when the Multi-Assets Mode is activated, users can use BTC as margin when trading the aforementioned perpetual contract(s). The aforementioned perpetual contract(s) are subject to the Binance Terms of Use and the Binance Futures Service Agreement.Futures and spot token listings are not correlated. A token listed on Binance Futures does not guarantee that it will be listed on Binance Spot.In case there is a discrepancy between this announcement and any Futures FAQ, please refer to this announcement for the most accurate and updated information.There may be discrepancies between this original content in English and any translated versions. Please refer to the original English version for the most accurate information, in case any discrepancies arise.Further Information:Trading Rules of USDⓈ-M Futures ContractsLeverage and Margin of USDⓈ-M Futures ContractsBinance Futures Fee StructureHow to Select Trading PairsFunding Rate HistoryMark Price and Price IndexMulti-Assets ModeThank you for your support!Binance Team2025-08-27Disclaimer: Binance Alpha features emerging digital assets which are not listed on the Binance Exchange. The labelling as an Alpha Asset do not imply that such asset will be listed on the Binance Exchange. You may lose all or part of what you invested. Please note that (i) Alpha Assets are exposed to increase price volatility, and therefore higher risks (ii) you are exposed to price slippage and blockchain fees (iii) Alpha Assets cannot be withdrawn from the Binance Exchange. Binance will not be responsible for any losses that you may incur arising from an investment in Binance Alpha Assets.Trade on-the-go with Binance’s crypto trading app (iOS/Android)Find us on TelegramWhatsAppXFacebookInstagramDiscordBinance reserves the right in its sole discretion to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reasons without prior notice.Disclaimer: In compliance with MiCA requirements, from 2024-06-30, unauthorized stablecoins are subject to certain restrictions for EEA users. For more information, please click here. Digital asset prices can be volatile. The value of your investment may go down or up and you may not get back the amount invested. You are solely responsible for your investment decisions and Binance is not liable for any losses you may incur. Futures trading, in particular, is subject to high market risk and price volatility. You may be called upon at short notice to make additional margin deposits or interest payments. If the required margin deposits or interest payments are not made within the prescribed time, your collateral may be liquidated without your consent. Moreover, you will remain liable for any resulting deficit in your account and interest charged on your account. All of your margin balance may be liquidated in the event of adverse price movement. Past performance is not a reliable predictor of future performance. Before trading, you should make an independent assessment of the appropriateness of the transaction in light of your own objectives and circumstances, including the risks and potential benefits. Consult your own advisers, where appropriate. This information should not be construed as financial or investment advice. To learn more about how to protect yourself, visit our Responsible Trading page. column7: 币安HODLer空投上线Dolomite (DOLO)，使用BNB申购保本赚币产品，以获得DOLO回溯空投！
column9:
币安HODLer空投上线Dolomite (DOLO)，使用BNB申购保本赚币产品，以获得DOLO回溯空投！ | 币安
一键买币行情交易合约理财广场更多登录注册1. 扫码下载
2. 发任意邮件至download@binance.com, 自动获取下载链接更多下载选择数字货币及交易对上新币安最新动态币安最新活动法币及交易对上新下架讯息钱包维护动态币安API更新空投帮助中心公告中心数字货币及交易对上新币安HODLe...LO回溯空投！币安HODLer空投上线Dolomite (DOLO)，使用BNB申购保本赚币产品，以获得DOLO回溯空投！发布于 2025-08-27 18:43注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第33期项目 – Dolomite (DOLO), 一种去中心化的货币市场协议和 DEX。2025年08月03日08:00至2025年08月07日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月28日00:00（东八区时间）上市DOLO，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 DOLO充值通道将于2025年08月27日20:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 DOLO (LINK) ，但DOLO现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。DOLO HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Dolomite (DOLO)代币总供应量：998,851,995 DOLO代币最大供应量：1,000,000,000 DOLO HODLer空投代币总量：15,000,000 DOLO（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外有 10,000,000 DOLO 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：264,888,401 DOLO（占代币最大供应量的 26.49%）智能合约/网络详情：以太坊 (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)Arbitrium (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)上币费：0研究报告：Dolomite (DOLO)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转DOLO到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，DOLO将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售DOLO。在DOLO从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 DOLO 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的DOLO余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha DEX。2025年08月03日08:00至2025年08月07日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月28日00:00（东八区时间）上市DOLO，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 DOLO充值通道将于2025年08月27日20:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 DOLO (LINK) ，但DOLO现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。DOLO HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Dolomite (DOLO)代币总供应量：998,851,995 DOLO代币最大供应量：1,000,000,000 DOLO HODLer空投代币总量：15,000,000 DOLO（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外有 10,000,000 DOLO 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：264,888,401 DOLO（占代币最大供应量的 26.49%）智能合约/网络详情：以太坊 (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)Arbitrium (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)上币费：0研究报告：Dolomite (DOLO)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 DEX。2025年08月03日08:00至2025年08月07日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月28日00:00（东八区时间）上市DOLO，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 DOLO充值通道将于2025年08月27日20:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 DOLO (LINK) ，但DOLO现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。DOLO HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Dolomite (DOLO)代币总供应量：998,851,995 DOLO代币最大供应量：1,000,000,000 DOLO HODLer空投代币总量：15,000,000 DOLO（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外有 10,000,000 DOLO 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：264,888,401 DOLO（占代币最大供应量的 26.49%）智能合约/网络详情：以太坊 (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)Arbitrium (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)上币费：0研究报告：Dolomite (DOLO)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转DOLO到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，DOLO将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售DOLO。在DOLO从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 DOLO 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的DOLO余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 是代币上市前观察选择池，币安Alpha的项目在币安现货市场上架时，币安Alpha将不再展示该项目的资产。用户须完成身份认证（KYC）且来自符合条件的司法管辖区，才能参与HODLer空投；空投代币将在币安现货上线前自动转入至每位用户的现货钱包中；若非另行说明，如果有多个HODLer空投项目同时进行，用户在BNB保本赚币产品（定期和/或活期）和链上赚币产品中的BNB资产将分配到这些项目中；在币安借贷（活期利率）作为抵押的保本赚币BNB活期产品，将无法获得HODLer空投奖励；申购保本赚币产品的BNB资产，仍可享有常用的福利，例如：参与Launchpool和Megadrop资格以及VIP等级福利；HODLer空投奖励计算将支持币安无私钥钱包中的质押 Lista BNB （slisBNB）和slisBNB Non-Transferable Receipt (slisBNBx) ;在任何快照时间，您的任意一项可支持资产必须大于0.01 BNB才能纳入计算。对于以上交易对，现货算法订单也同时将在2025年08月28日00:00（东八区时间）开始支持交易。交易机器人和现货跟单交易将在上述代币于现货上市后1 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月27日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享注册赢取奖励立即注册，最高可获 是代币上市前观察选择池，币安Alpha的项目在币安现货市场上架时，币安Alpha将不再展示该项目的资产。用户须完成身份认证（KYC）且来自符合条件的司法管辖区，才能参与HODLer空投；空投代币将在币安现货上线前自动转入至每位用户的现货钱包中；若非另行说明，如果有多个HODLer空投项目同时进行，用户在BNB保本赚币产品（定期和/或活期）和链上赚币产品中的BNB资产将分配到这些项目中；在币安借贷（活期利率）作为抵押的保本赚币BNB活期产品，将无法获得HODLer空投奖励；申购保本赚币产品的BNB资产，仍可享有常用的福利，例如：参与Launchpool和Megadrop资格以及VIP等级福利；HODLer空投奖励计算将支持币安无私钥钱包中的质押 Lista BNB （slisBNB）和slisBNB Non-Transferable Receipt (slisBNBx) ;在任何快照时间，您的任意一项可支持资产必须大于0.01 BNB才能纳入计算。对于以上交易对，现货算法订单也同时将在2025年08月28日00:00（东八区时间）开始支持交易。交易机器人和现货跟单交易将在上述代币于现货上市后1 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月27日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享注册赢取奖励立即注册，最高可获 18:43注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第33期项目 – Dolomite (DOLO), 一种去中心化的货币市场协议和 DEX。2025年08月03日08:00至2025年08月07日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月28日00:00（东八区时间）上市DOLO，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 DOLO充值通道将于2025年08月27日20:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 DOLO (LINK) ，但DOLO现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。DOLO HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Dolomite (DOLO)代币总供应量：998,851,995 DOLO代币最大供应量：1,000,000,000 DOLO HODLer空投代币总量：15,000,000 DOLO（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外有 10,000,000 DOLO 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：264,888,401 DOLO（占代币最大供应量的 26.49%）智能合约/网络详情：以太坊 (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)Arbitrium (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)上币费：0研究报告：Dolomite (DOLO)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 DEX。2025年08月03日08:00至2025年08月07日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月28日00:00（东八区时间）上市DOLO，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 DOLO充值通道将于2025年08月27日20:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 DOLO (LINK) ，但DOLO现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。DOLO HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Dolomite (DOLO)代币总供应量：998,851,995 DOLO代币最大供应量：1,000,000,000 DOLO HODLer空投代币总量：15,000,000 DOLO（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外有 10,000,000 DOLO 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：264,888,401 DOLO（占代币最大供应量的 26.49%）智能合约/网络详情：以太坊 (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)Arbitrium (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)上币费：0研究报告：Dolomite (DOLO)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转DOLO到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，DOLO将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售DOLO。在DOLO从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 DOLO 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的DOLO余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 是代币上市前观察选择池，币安Alpha的项目在币安现货市场上架时，币安Alpha将不再展示该项目的资产。用户须完成身份认证（KYC）且来自符合条件的司法管辖区，才能参与HODLer空投；空投代币将在币安现货上线前自动转入至每位用户的现货钱包中；若非另行说明，如果有多个HODLer空投项目同时进行，用户在BNB保本赚币产品（定期和/或活期）和链上赚币产品中的BNB资产将分配到这些项目中；在币安借贷（活期利率）作为抵押的保本赚币BNB活期产品，将无法获得HODLer空投奖励；申购保本赚币产品的BNB资产，仍可享有常用的福利，例如：参与Launchpool和Megadrop资格以及VIP等级福利；HODLer空投奖励计算将支持币安无私钥钱包中的质押 Lista BNB （slisBNB）和slisBNB Non-Transferable Receipt (slisBNBx) ;在任何快照时间，您的任意一项可支持资产必须大于0.01 BNB才能纳入计算。对于以上交易对，现货算法订单也同时将在2025年08月28日00:00（东八区时间）开始支持交易。交易机器人和现货跟单交易将在上述代币于现货上市后1 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月27日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享注册赢取奖励立即注册，最高可获 DEX。2025年08月03日08:00至2025年08月07日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月28日00:00（东八区时间）上市DOLO，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 DOLO充值通道将于2025年08月27日20:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 DOLO (LINK) ，但DOLO现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。DOLO HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Dolomite (DOLO)代币总供应量：998,851,995 DOLO代币最大供应量：1,000,000,000 DOLO HODLer空投代币总量：15,000,000 DOLO（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外有 10,000,000 DOLO 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：264,888,401 DOLO（占代币最大供应量的 26.49%）智能合约/网络详情：以太坊 (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)Arbitrium (0x0F81001eF0A83ecCE5ccebf63EB302c70a39a654)上币费：0研究报告：Dolomite (DOLO)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安
