column7: Gate to Launch AriaAI (ARIA) Perpetual Contract, Margin Loans, Bots, Copy Trading, Convert, and Auto...
column9:
Gate 将上线 AriaAI (ARIA) 合约交易、杠杆借贷交易、交易机器人、跟单、闪兑、定投功能 [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE 为了提供更丰富的交易选择，Gate 将按以下时间线上线 AriaAI (ARIA) 合约交易、杠杆借贷交易、交易机器人、跟单、闪兑、定投功能，期待您的体验。 **合约** Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 21 日 21:10 (UTC+8) 首发上线 ARIA 永续合约实盘交易 （USDT 结算），支持 1 - 20 倍杠杆。 ARIA 永续合约实盘交易链接：https://www.gate.com/zh/futures/USDT/ARIA_USDT **注：** - 上述永续合约将在上线后 1 小时内开放跟单交易和交易机器人服务。 - 关于上线时间：若前期价格波动较大，合约上线时间可能会延后，根据实际情况调整具体上线时间。 - 关于交易参数调整：为防范市场风险、优化用户交易体验，Gate 将根据实际情况，适时调整资金费率、最小变动价位、最大杠杆、风险限额及维持保证金等交易参数。 **杠杆借贷交易** Gate 将于 2025 年 8 月 21 日 21:10 (UTC+8) 新增 ARIA 统一账户借贷、逐仓杠杆交易对，并同步上线 ARIA 余币宝理财、活期抵押借贷、定期抵押借贷功能。 **闪兑** Gate 将于 ARIA 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 ARIA 闪兑功能，用户可将 ARIA 兑换成 USDT 或闪兑支持的其他代币。 **定投** Gate 将于 ARIA 现货上线 1 小时后上线用户 ARIA 定投功能，支持每小时、每天等不同定投周期。

column7: Gate Now Supports YZY MONEY (YZY) for Futures Trading, Margin Loans, Bots, Copy, Convert, and Auto-I...
column9:
Gate 已上线 YZY MONEY (YZY) 合约交易、杠杆借贷交易、交易机器人、跟单、闪兑、定投功能 [//]:content-type-MARKDOWN-DONOT-DELETE 为了提供更丰富的交易选择，Gate 已上线 YZY MONEY (YZY) 合约交易、杠杆借贷交易、交易机器人、跟单、闪兑、定投功能，期待您的体验。 **合约** Gate 已上线 YZY MONEY (YZY) 永续合约实盘交易（USDT 结算），支持 1 - 20 倍杠杆。 YZY 永续合约实盘交易链接：https://www.gate.com/zh/futures/USDT/YZY_USDT **注：** - 上述永续合约已开放跟单交易和交易机器人服务。 - 关于交易参数调整：为防范市场风险、优化用户交易体验，Gate 将根据实际情况，适时调整资金费率、最小变动价位、最大杠杆、风险限额及维持保证金等交易参数。 **杠杆借贷交易** Gate 已新增 YZY 统一账户借贷、逐仓杠杆交易对，并已同步上线 YZY 余币宝理财、活期抵押借贷、定期抵押借贷功能。 **闪兑** Gate 已上线用户 YZY 闪兑功能，用户可将 YZY 兑换成 USDT 或闪兑支持的其他代币。 **定投** Gate 已上线用户 YZY 定投功能，支持每小时、每天等不同定投周期。

column7: CoinEx Will List SAPIEN (Sapien) on Aug 21, 2025
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide you with more trading options, after rigorous reviews, CoinEx will list SAPIEN (Sapien) on Aug 21, 2025. The details are as follows: List Time1. Deposit: 10:00 on Aug 21 (UTC)2. Withdrawal: 10:00 on Aug 21 (UTC)3. Trading pair: SAPIEN/USDT4. Opening method: Call Auction    a. Call Auction        10:00-10:20 Aug 21 (UTC)        Orders can be placed and canceled        10:20-10:30 Aug 21 (UTC)        Orders can be placed but cannot be canceled    b. Trading        10:30 Aug 21 (UTC)5. Service support: SAPIEN/USDT supports AMM, Spot Grid, and Auto-Invest Plan. SAPIEN (Base）：0xC729777d0470F30612B1564Fd96E8Dd26f5814E3 About SAPIENSapien addresses AI industry challenges by providing verified, high-quality human knowledge to train AI models. It leverages a global contributor network incentivized by the $SAPIEN token through its Proof of Quality protocol, ensuring data traceability and trustworthiness. With over 1.8 million contributors completing 185 million tasks, Sapien serves sectors like autonomous vehicles, medical AI, and global development, enabling scalable AI data pipelines while fostering decentralized governance and economic alignment via token-based participation.Learn more about SAPIEN>> About Automated Market Making (AMM)AMM is supported for the SAPIEN/USDT market. CoinEx AMM allows every user to become a market maker. By adding liquidity to the liquidity pool, users can share 50% of the trading fees earned in this market. The fee dividends are calculated daily. Learn about AMM >> About Spot GridSpot Grid is supported for the SAPIEN/USDT market. Spot Grid is a trading strategy suitable for volatile markets. It helps you capture profits in market fluctuations by automatically executing buy low and sell high within a certain market range 24 hours a day. Learn about Spot Grid >> About Auto-Invest PlanAuto-Invest Plan is supported for the SAPIEN/USDT market. CoinEx Auto-Invest Plan is a trading strategy that helps you automatically accumulate crypto assets via pre-set investment and recurring cycles. It has the advantages of automatic execution, convenience, and friendly entry. With a minimum of 1 USDT, you can make stable investments and realize wealth growth. Learn about Auto-Invest Plan >> Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. CoinEx reserves the final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 21, 2025  · Invite friends to register and share up to 40% trading fee rebate. column7: CoinEx Will Delist AIPG, AIT, UWU, BRWL, RAT, and LEASH
column9: Dear CoinEx users, To provide better investment options for global users, CoinEx will conduct regular reviews on all cryptos listed on our platform according to the Delisting Criteria and will delist the ones that fail to meet our standards. When conducting a review, CoinEx will comprehensively consider many factors (including but not limited to community construction and operation factors, technology development factors, transaction volume, liquidity, etc.), and make delisting decisions prudently. Therefore, we have decided to start the delisting process of the following cryptos on Aug 21, 2025. The details are as follows.Delisted CryptosAIPG, AIT, UWU, BRWL, RAT, LEASH Delisted PairsAIPG/USDT, AIT/USDT, UWU/USDT, BRWL/USDT, RAT/USDT, LEASH/USDT Service Termination1. Deposit of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Aug 28, 2025 (UTC)2. Trading of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Aug 28, 2025 (UTC)3. Withdrawal of the above cryptos terminates at: 8:00 Nov 28, 2025 (UTC) Notes1. Users who have unexecuted orders related to the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please cancel them in advance. If it fails, cancellations will be made automatically by the order system. The refunded assets can be checked in your account.2. For liquidity providers of the to-be-delisted trading pairs, please withdraw the liquidity in advance. If the withdrawal is not made after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the withdrawal and the relevant assets will be returned to your Spot account.3. For users who are executing trading strategies, please cancel the strategies in advance. If the strategies are not canceled after the delisting, the system will automatically execute the cancellations.4. Deposit, withdrawal, and trading of the above cryptos will be terminated precisely as scheduled, and these cryptos will no longer be available for deposit, withdrawal, or trading after delisting.5. For holders of the to-be-delisted cryptos, please make sure to complete the withdrawal or asset replacement (transaction/swap) before the delisting to avoid unnecessary losses.6. If your balance of the to-be-delisted crypto is less than the minimum order amount, you can convert your assets into CET via the Small Asset Converter. For more info, please refer to Convert Small Assets into CET. Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.CoinEx reserves the right of final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamAug 21, 2025

column7: Upcoming Listing: BloFin to List PGPT for Spot Trading
column9: Dear BloFin users, To extend the range of trading options available on BloFin Spot and improve users' spot trading experience, BloFin will soon list $PGPT (PrivateAI) on our spot trading markets. Stay tuned! About PGPT:PrivateAI is a secure protocol to store, process, validate and sell data assets. PrivateAI will generate datasets from any unstructured data provided. Semantic Models developed by the protocol will capture anomalies, making sure your dataset is Machine Learning ready.PrivateAI is aimed at researchers, AI engineers, and institutions, it transforms the way AI interprets and utilizes research data, unlocking valuable insights, transforming those data into research graphs and fostering innovation across various scientific domains.Through its peer-to-peer Data-as-a-Service model, PrivateAI facilitates a collaborative ecosystem for data analysis, enhancing the discovery process and ensuring fair compensation for contributors, thereby revolutionizing scientific research and data utilization for the greater good.X LinkOfficial WebsiteWhitepaper Further Reading:BloFin Spot Trading FeeBloFin Spot Trading Guide To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the app from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 21, 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: YZY Money (YZY) Gets Listed on Bitunix!
column9:
Dear Bitunix Users,
YZY Money (YZY) is getting listed on Bitunix. The supported trading pair will be YZY/USDT on the spot market and perpetual futures market.
Deposit & Withdrawal
Deposits Effective Immediately
Withdrawal: 09:00 on August 21, 2025 (UTC)
Spot Trading
Spot trading for YZY/USDT will start at 09:00 on August 21, 2025 (UTC).
Futures Trading
Futures trading for for YZY/USDT will start soon.
*Please note:
Based on market risk conditions, Bitunix may adjust the parameters from time to time, which include the minimum moving price, maximum leverage, initial margin, and/or maintenance margin requirements.
The perpetual futures listed above are subject to the terms of the Bitunix Futures Services Agreement.
In the event of any discrepancies between the translated versions and the original English version, the English version shall take precedence.
Project Introduction
YZY Money (YZY)
YZY Money (YZY) is a newly launched Solana-based memecoin created by Kanye West (Ye), designed as part of a broader ecosystem that includes the YZY token, Ye Pay for crypto payments, and the YZY Card for global spending.
Official Website: https://money.yeezy.com/
Blockchain Explorer: https://solscan.io/token/DrZ26cKJDksVRWib3DVVsjo9eeXccc7hKhDJviiYEEZY

Bitunix Team

column9:

We are thrilled to announce that YZY MONEY (YZY) will be listed in the Innovation and Meme Zone. Check out the details below:

Introduction
The YZY token is a cryptocurrency launched by American rapper Kanye West, intended as the official payment currency for the Yeezy brand. YZY tokenomics: 20% for public sale, 10% for liquidity pool, 30% allocated to Yeezy Investments LLC (3-month lockup, 24-month linear release), 20% allocated to the team (6-month lockup, 24-month linear release), and 20% for the ecosystem development fund (12-month lockup, 24-month linear release).

column7: BloFin Futures Will Delist TLMUSDT, COSUSDT, 1000XECUSDT, and 1000BTTUSDT
column9: Dear BloFin users, To maintain a high-quality trading market and meet a high level of standard and industry requirements, BloFin expects to delist TLMUSDT, COSUSDT, 1000XECUSDT, and 1000BTTUSDT Perpetual Contracts at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 26, 2025 based on our periodic token reviews. Delisting details:Users are not allowed to open new positions for the aforementioned contracts starting from this announcement. Reduce-only orders for closing positions are supported.All active and conditional orders for the above-mentioned perpetual contracts will be canceled at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 26, 2025.BloFin Futures will close all positions and conduct an automatic settlement on the above-mentioned perpetual contracts at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 26, 2025. Please note:This delisting only affects BloFin contract products (including contract copy trading).The aforementioned contracts will be delisted after the settlement is complete. Users are advised to close any open positions prior to the delisting time to avoid automatic settlement.To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism. Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 20, 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: Bitunix to Delist Multiple Trading Pairs from Spot Market (08-22-2025)
column9:
Dear Users,
To better protect user rights and interests, Bitunix continues to improve internal controls, upgrade audit standards, and strengthen comprehensive risk control mechanisms. Bitunix will delist certain tokens and adjust trading pairs in accordance with platform regulations. After internal review, the following tokens have shown abnormal performance, low liquidity, or lack of active development. As a result, Bitunix will proceed with delisting and risk control actions. At the same time, Bitunix will regularly optimize relevant rules and processes to ensure a healthier trading environment for listed projects. These changes include suspending spot trading and Convert features for the affected tokens.
Based on the criteria above, Bitunix will delist Bombie (BOMB), Coresky (CSKY) on August 22, 2025.
To avoid unnecessary losses or disruptions, please complete any related operations within the specified time frame. We recommend that you take necessary action in advance, such as converting any remaining balances or cancelling active orders.
Deposit and Withdrawal
Deposit of the tokens: suspended.
Withdrawal Suspension: September 22, 2025, 07:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading
Bitunix will delist the following spot trading pairs on August 22, 2025, at 07:00 (UTC): BOMB/USDT, CSKY/USDT. If users have any open orders for these trading pairs before delisting, they will be cancelled automatically.
Convert
Bitunix Convert will disable the convert for the above-mentioned tokens on August 22, 2025, at 07:00 (UTC). At the same time, small balance conversion to USDT for these tokens will also be removed. We recommend that users convert their small balances in advance.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the adjustment of currency and transaction pairs. If you encounter any problems during the process, please contact us via our live chat or email us at support@bitunix.com.
Thank you for your support!
The Bitunix Team
August 20, 2025

column7: Bitunix to Delist CSPR/USDT From Futures Market (08-22-2025)
column9:
Dear Bitunix users,
To better protect user interests, Bitunix continuously adjusts and upgrades its review standards while comprehensively optimizing risk control rules. Bitunix conducts regular reviews of listed digital assets and will promptly reassess projects with insufficient liquidity, low activity, or potential security risks. At the same time, Bitunix closely monitors regulatory changes to ensure that listed digital assets comply with relevant regulatory requirements and may take measures such as suspending trading or delisting trading pairs if necessary.
Based on the above criteria, Bitunix will delist Casper (CSPR) on August 22, 2025.
In order to avoid bringing you unnecessary troubles and prevent you from suffering irreparable losses, please take all reasonable and necessary measures to properly handle the digital assets held by you within the following period.
Futures Trading
Bitunix Futures will automatically settle and delist the following USDT-margined perpetual futures trading pairs on August 22, 2025, at 07:00 (UTC): CSPR/USDT
If users still hold positions in these USDT-margined perpetual futures at the time of settlement, the system will automatically settle and close the positions. Users are advised to close their positions in advance and avoid opening new positions to prevent unnecessary risks.
In order to protect users and prevent potential risks in extremely volatile market conditions, Bitunix may undertake additional protective actions toward the trading pairs without further announcement, including but not limited to adjusting the risk limit tiers, maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin rate, updating funding rates, such as the interest rate and funding rate, and using the Last Price Protected mechanism to update the Mark Price.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the adjustment of currency and transaction pairs. If you encounter any problems during the process, please contact us via our live chat or email us at support@bitunix.com .
Thank you for your support!
Bitunix Team

column7: [Initial Listing] Bitget Will List Sapien (SAPIEN) in the Innovation and AI Zone
column9:
[Initial Listing] Bitget Will List Sapien (SAPIEN) in the Innovation and AI Zone
We are thrilled to announce that Sapien (SAPIEN) will be listed in the Innovation and AI Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 20 August 2025, 17:00 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available: 21 August 2025, 18:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: SAPIEN/USDT
Introduction
Sapien is a decentralized data foundry powered by Proof of Quality: a structured trust mechanism combining staking, peer validation, slashing, and rewards to enforce quality at scale without centralized oversight. Contributors stake SAPIEN tokens as collateral before tasks, which peers with on-chain reputation review; high-quality work earns rewards while poor performance results in penalties and reputation loss. This programmable enforcement layer ensures that economic incentives are directly tied to verified output, enabling Sapien to deliver enterprise-grade AI training data for clients such as Toyota, Amazon-Zoox, Alibaba, and Lenovo.

We are thrilled to announce that AriaAI (ARIA) will be listed in the Innovation and GameFi Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 21 August 2025, 13:00 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available:  22 August 2025, 14:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: ARIA/USDT
Introduction
Aria.AI is a next-generation game development and publishing experiment inspired by Disney-style immersive worlds and AI technology, designed with its own IP related gameplay at its core. It represents a major leap forward in bringing Web2-quality game design and publishing standards into the Web3 era.
With the integration of AI, ARIA is evolving into a living, adaptive game world — featuring intelligent NPCs, personalized storytelling, AI-generated content, and dynamic gameplay that grows with its players.
Aria.AI has strong backers not only from web3 investors but also from web2, Folius, Spartan, Beam, Galaxy Interactive, Animoca Brands...etc who believe AI will change the game status quo and Aria.Ai are one of the pioneers with such belief to explore how to implement AI into game design and publishing.

2. 发任意邮件至download@binance.com, 自动获取下载链接更多下载选择数字货币及交易对上新币安最新动态币安最新活动法币及交易对上新下架讯息钱包维护动态币安API更新空投帮助中心公告中心下架讯息币安移除部分现...5-08-22币安移除部分现货交易对的公告 - 2025-08-22发布于 2025-08-20 11:00这是常规性公告，公告涉及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：为了更好地保护用户和维护高质量的交易市场，币安会对所有上线的现货交易对进行定期审核，并可能因流动性和交易量不佳等多种因素下架部分现货交易对。根据近期审核结果，币安将移除以下现货交易对并停止交易：2025年08月22日11:00（东八区时间）：MOVE/FDUSD、NIL/FDUSD 和SXT/BNB注意：下架某个现货交易对不会影响用户在币安现货平台交易其对应代币（如适用），用户仍然可以在币安平台提供的其他交易对上交易该现货交易对的基础资产和报价资产；币安将于2025年08月22日11:00（东八区时间）从以上现货交易对移除交易机器人服务（如适用）。强烈建议用户在上述交易对交易机器人服务停止之前，关闭和/或取消相关现货交易机器人，以避免任何潜在的损失；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。更多信息：币安下架准则及常见问题解答如何在币安平台上查看代币和现货交易对的下架信息感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月20日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产的价格受高市场风险和价格波动影响。个人投资价值跌宕起伏，且投资本金可能无法收回。一旦达到指定的间隔，交易机器人将一致执行所有订单。在数字资产暴跌或飙升的情况下，可能也会照常执行。过往表现并非未来表现的可靠指标。您对自己的投资全权负责，币安对您可能遭受的损失不承担任何责任。您应该只投资自己熟悉且了解相关风险的产品。您应该仔细考虑自己的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并先咨询独立的财务顾问，然后再进行任何投资。本材料不应视为财务建议。欲了解详情，敬请参阅我们的使用条款和风险警示。分享注册赢取奖励立即注册，最高可获 100 USDT 的交易手续费返还（仅限认证用户）立即注册最新发布文章币安Button Game回归：点击按钮倒计时至00:00秒，赢取10 ETH！币安合约将上线SOMIUSDT USDT永续合约盘前交易 (2025-08-25)关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 - column7: Bybit Web3 新增 4 种资产
column9:
Bybit Web3 平台焕新回归，4 种新资产正式上线。公告发布日期:2025-08-19T10:00:00.000Z
Bybit Web3 平台焕新回归，4 种新资产正式上线。通过 Bybit Web3，用户可使用 Bybit 统一交易账户 (UTA) 参与链上交易和 DeFi 活动，无需外部钱包或矿工费代币，轻松安全玩转 Web3。[FWOG (FWOG)](https://solscan.io/token/A8C3xuqscfmyLrte3VmTqrAq8kgMASius9AFNANwpump) 合约地址：A8C3xuqscfmyLrte3VmTqrAq8kgMASius9AFNANwpump | [官网](https://x.com/solfwog)[Worthless Coin (WORTHLESS)](https://solscan.io/token/iUdvUaxyRHh8PYVcmkgBpSJu5evpW6jsSLv8RCpmoon) 合约地址：iUdvUaxyRHh8PYVcmkgBpSJu5evpW6jsSLv8RCpmoon [Clippy PFP Cult (CLIPPY)](https://solscan.io/token/7eMJmn1bYWSQEwxAX7CyngBzGNGu1cT582asKxxRpump) 合约地址：7eMJmn1bYWSQEwxAX7CyngBzGNGu1cT582asKxxRpump[nubcat (nub)](https://solscan.io/token/GtDZKAqvMZMnti46ZewMiXCa4oXF4bZxwQPoKzXPFxZn) 合约地址：GtDZKAqvMZMnti46ZewMiXCa4oXF4bZxwQPoKzXPFxZn | [官网](https://www.nubcat.xyz/)您可直接使用 Bybit UTA 余额中的 USDT、USDC、SOL 或 BBSOL 买币。 - 可前往 Bybit App - Web3 -“资产”，或网页端“交易”- Web3 -“持有中”查看新买入的 Web3 资产- 可在同一界面中卖出代币- 资金所得（USDT、USDC、SOL 或 BBSOL）将自动显示在 UTA 中注：通过 Bybit Web3 买入的 Web3 资产不支持外部提币，但可兑换为支持币种。发现下一波增长，解锁更多资产，共创链上金融未来，仅在 Bybit Web3。风险提示：

Bybit Web3 平台焕新回归，4 种新资产正式上线。通过 Bybit Web3，用户可使用 Bybit 统一交易账户 (UTA) 参与链上交易和 DeFi 活动，无需外部钱包或矿工费代币，轻松安全玩转 Web3。[FWOG (FWOG)](https://solscan.io/token/A8C3xuqscfmyLrte3VmTqrAq8kgMASius9AFNANwpump) 合约地址：A8C3xuqscfmyLrte3VmTqrAq8kgMASius9AFNANwpump | [官网](https://x.com/solfwog)[Worthless Coin (WORTHLESS)](https://solscan.io/token/iUdvUaxyRHh8PYVcmkgBpSJu5evpW6jsSLv8RCpmoon) 合约地址：iUdvUaxyRHh8PYVcmkgBpSJu5evpW6jsSLv8RCpmoon [Clippy PFP Cult (CLIPPY)](https://solscan.io/token/7eMJmn1bYWSQEwxAX7CyngBzGNGu1cT582asKxxRpump) 合约地址：7eMJmn1bYWSQEwxAX7CyngBzGNGu1cT582asKxxRpump[nubcat (nub)](https://solscan.io/token/GtDZKAqvMZMnti46ZewMiXCa4oXF4bZxwQPoKzXPFxZn) 合约地址：GtDZKAqvMZMnti46ZewMiXCa4oXF4bZxwQPoKzXPFxZn | [官网](https://www.nubcat.xyz/)您可直接使用 Bybit UTA 余额中的 USDT、USDC、SOL 或 BBSOL 买币。 - 可前往 Bybit App - Web3 -“资产”，或网页端“交易”- Web3 -“持有中”查看新买入的 Web3 资产- 可在同一界面中卖出代币- 资金所得（USDT、USDC、SOL 或 BBSOL）将自动显示在 UTA 中注：通过 Bybit Web3 买入的 Web3 资产不支持外部提币，但可兑换为支持币种。发现下一波增长，解锁更多资产，共创链上金融未来，仅在 Bybit Web3。风险提示：

column7: [Initial Listing] Bitget Will List DecentralGPT (DGC) in the Innovation and AI Zone
column9:
[Initial Listing] Bitget Will List DecentralGPT (DGC) in the Innovation and AI Zone
We are thrilled to announce that DecentralGPT (DGC) will be listed in the Innovation and AI Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 20 August 2025, 13:00 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available:  21 August 2025, 14:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: DGC/USDT
Introduction
DecentralGPT is the world’s first decentralized LLM inference network built on blockchain and DePIN infrastructure. By leveraging distributed GPU resources, it enables secure, low-cost, and censorship-resistant large language model (LLM) inference. The platform introduces Context NFTs, AI Agents, and a mining economy to democratize AI access. DecentralGPT is redefining the future of open, transparent, and universally accessible AGI.
Contract Address (BEP20):
0x9cfAE8067322394e34E6b734c4a3F72aCC4a7Fe5

column7: BingX Will Delist MAXWELLCAT, EVAN, O4DX and TROLL From Spot Trading & Other Services
column9: Dear Users, To ensure a positive trading experience for BingX users and improve liquidity in the spot market, BingX adheres to the Token Management Rules and actively considers users feedback. Any assets that violate these rules or pose high risks will be delisted. Affected spot trading pairs: MAXWELLCAT/USDT, EVAN/USDT, O4DX/USDT and TROLL/USDT BingX will delist the aforementioned spot trading pairs on 2025-08-22 at 08:00:00 (UTC). Please cancel your orders in advance. If no action is taken, the system will automatically cancel your orders at the scheduled time. This process may take 1 to 3 business days, and we appreciate your patience and understanding during this time. Deposits for MAXWELLCAT, EVAN, O4DX and TROLL have been suspended, and it will not be reopened in the future. The withdrawal service for MAXWELLCAT, EVAN, O4DX and TROLL will be permanently suspended on 2025-11-22 at 08:00:00 (UTC), and will not be resumed. Please ensure all withdrawals are completed in advance. The Convert Crypto Dust into USDT feature will be disabled 2 calendar days prior to delisting and will not be available afterward. Please convert your assets in advance. BingX will assist you with any issues that arise during the above-mentioned period. If you have questions, please contact our online support team at any time. Please be reminded that cryptocurrencies are highly volatile and carry various risks, and that trading cryptocurrencies can result in investment losses. Please stay informed and invest prudently. BingX remains committed to delivering an improved trading experience and services. Thank you for your understanding and continued support. BingX Operation Team 2025-08-19 BingX Official Channels BingX Web: https://bingx.com BingX Blog: https://blog.bingx.com Telegram: https://t.me/BingXOfficial X: https://x.com/BingXOfficial YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/bingx Risk Disclaimer Cryptocurrency prices are subject to high market risk and price volatility. You should only invest in products that you are familiar with and where you understand the associated risks. You should carefully consider your investment experience, financial situation, investment objectives and risk tolerance and consult an independent financial adviser prior to making any investment. This material is for reference only and should not be construed as financial advice. Past performance is not a reliable indicator of future performance. The value of your investment can go down as well as up, and you may not get back the amount you invested. You are solely responsible for your investment decisions. BingX is not responsible for any losses you may incur. BingX attaches great importance to compliance and strictly abides by local regulations. Please obey local laws and regulations in your country or region. BingX reserves the right in its sole discretion to amend, change, or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. For more information, please refer to our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: BloFin Spot Will Delist BUZZ, MVL and ROAM
column9: Dear BloFin Users, To maintain a robust spot trading environment, BloFin conducts periodic reviews of all listed spot trading pairs. Our top priority is providing the best services and protections for our users while staying adaptable to changing market conditions. Based on our latest review, BloFin will remove the BUZZ/USDT, MVL/USDT, and ROAM/USDT spot trading pairs. Delisting details are as follows:Spot Trading: All trades and pending orders for the above-mentioned pairs will be automatically removed and canceled at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 19, 2025. Users are strongly advised to update or cancel their orders prior to the termination of Spot Trading services to avoid any potential losses. Deposits: We will close deposits for the above-mentioned spots at 07:30 (UTC) on Aug 19, 2025, 2025. Please manage your assets promptly.Withdrawals: We will close withdrawals for the above-mentioned spots at 07:00 (UTC) on Oct 19, 2025. Please ensure that you leave sufficient time for your assets to be fully processed prior to this time. Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Please contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance if you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting. Thanks for your support and understanding! BloFin TeamAug 18, 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

column7: LIGHT Migration to BingX Spot
column9: Dear Users, To enhance the trading service and experience for our users, BingX will migrate hot tokens from ChainSpot to Spot. The arrangements are as follows: Affected ChainSpot Trading Pair: LIGHT/USDT BingX ChainSpot is scheduled to suspend and delist spot trading for LIGHT on 06:45:00 (UTC) at 2025-08-18, and begin the migration process. Deposits and withdrawals for LIGHT will also be suspended. After the migration is complete, LIGHT tokens will be listed on BingX Spot, and trading will be available. Please stay tuned for official updates regarding the exact time. LIGHT contract address (SOL): LiGHtkg3uTa9836RaNkKLLriqTNRcMdRAhqjGWNv777 (Always verify the token consistency using the contract address.) Deposit and withdrawal services for LIGHT will resume alongside its listing on BingX Spot. Notes: All LIGHT tokens remain secure in your Spot Account throughout migration, and no action is required on your part. Please verify your LIGHT tokens using the official contract address above to avoid confusion with tokens of identical names. For further assistance, please contact our online support team via the BingX website or app, or email us at support@bingx.com. column7: BingX Will Delist XLMUSD, OPUSD, and More for Coin-M Perpetual Futures on 2025-08-29
column9: Dear Users,BingX periodically reviews the assets listed on our platform to ensure an optimal futures trading experience. When a trading pair no longer meets the listing standard or there are significant market changes, we will conduct an in-depth review and potentially delist it.As the platform is committed to providing a good trading experience, BingX will delist some trading pairs temporarily from Perpetual Futures on 2025-08-29 17:00 (UTC+8) (originally scheduled for delisting on 2025-08-22).Details are as follows: 1. Starting from 2025-08-19 10:00 (UTC+8), users will not be able to open new positions for the affected pairs. The ability to close existing positions will not be affected. 2. The affected pairs will be delisted on 2025-08-29 at 17:00 (UTC+8). Positions that are not closed in time will be closed by the system at the delisting time. Please manage your positions before the delisting to avoid any unnecessary losses. Affected Pairs:Coin-M Perpetual Futures: XLMUSD, OPUSD, TRXUSDNotes:1. This delisting only affects BingX Futures products (including Futures Copy Trading and Futures Grid). It doesn't affect BingX Spot.2. The affected pairs will cease trading and be delisted for both Copy Trading and Grid Trading. Additionally, all existing positions will be automatically closed at the time of delisting. Users are recommended to close the affected positions before the delisting. column7: 币安HODLer空投上线Plume (PLUME)，使用BNB申购保本赚币产品，以获得PLUME回溯空投！
column9:
币安HODLer空投上线Plume (PLUME)，使用BNB申购保本赚币产品，以获得PLUME回溯空投！ | 币安
一键买币行情交易合约理财广场更多登录注册1. 扫码下载
2. 发任意邮件至download@binance.com, 自动获取下载链接更多下载选择数字货币及交易对上新币安最新动态币安最新活动法币及交易对上新下架讯息钱包维护动态币安API更新空投帮助中心公告中心数字货币及交易对上新币安HODLe...ME回溯空投！币安HODLer空投上线Plume (PLUME)，使用BNB申购保本赚币产品，以获得PLUME回溯空投！发布于 2025-08-18 17:36注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第32期项目 – Plume (PLUME), 一个为现实世界资产 (RWA) 构建的与 EVM 兼容的区块链。2025年07月24日08:00至2025年07月28日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）上市PLUME，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 PLUME充值通道将于2025年08月18日19:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 PLUME (LINK) ，但PLUME现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。PLUME HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Plume (PLUME)创世代币总供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME 代币最大供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME HODLer空投代币总量：150,000,000 PLUME（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外25,000,000 PLUME 将在现货上市后用于市场活动，另有 100,000,000 PLUME 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：2,650,000,000 PLUME（占代币最大供应量的 26.50% ）智能合约/网络详情：Plume浏览器以太坊 (0x4C1746A800D224393fE2470C70A35717eD4eA5F1)上币费：0研究报告：Plume (PLUME)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转PLUME到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，PLUME将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售PLUME。在PLUME从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 PLUME 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的PLUME余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 是代币上市前观察选择池，币安Alpha的项目在币安现货市场上架时，币安Alpha将不再展示该项目的资产。用户须完成身份认证（KYC）且来自符合条件的司法管辖区，才能参与HODLer空投；空投代币将在币安现货上线前自动转入至每位用户的现货钱包中；若非另行说明，如果有多个HODLer空投项目同时进行，用户在BNB保本赚币产品（定期和/或活期）和链上赚币产品中的BNB资产将分配到这些项目中；在币安借贷（活期利率）作为抵押的保本赚币BNB活期产品，将无法获得HODLer空投奖励；申购保本赚币产品的BNB资产，仍可享有常用的福利，例如：参与Launchpool和Megadrop资格以及VIP等级福利；HODLer空投奖励计算将支持币安无私钥钱包中的质押 Lista BNB （slisBNB）和slisBNB Non-Transferable Receipt (slisBNBx) ;对于以上交易对，现货算法订单也同时将在2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）开始支持交易。交易机器人和现货跟单交易将在上述代币于现货上市后1 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 17:36注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第32期项目 – Plume (PLUME), 一个为现实世界资产 (RWA) 构建的与 EVM 兼容的区块链。2025年07月24日08:00至2025年07月28日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）上市PLUME，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 PLUME充值通道将于2025年08月18日19:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 PLUME (LINK) ，但PLUME现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。PLUME HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Plume (PLUME)创世代币总供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME 代币最大供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME HODLer空投代币总量：150,000,000 PLUME（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外25,000,000 PLUME 将在现货上市后用于市场活动，另有 100,000,000 PLUME 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：2,650,000,000 PLUME（占代币最大供应量的 26.50% ）智能合约/网络详情：Plume浏览器以太坊 (0x4C1746A800D224393fE2470C70A35717eD4eA5F1)上币费：0研究报告：Plume (PLUME)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 ，但PLUME现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。PLUME HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Plume (PLUME)创世代币总供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME 代币最大供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME HODLer空投代币总量：150,000,000 PLUME（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外25,000,000 PLUME 将在现货上市后用于市场活动，另有 100,000,000 PLUME 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：2,650,000,000 PLUME（占代币最大供应量的 26.50% ）智能合约/网络详情：Plume浏览器以太坊 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转PLUME到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，PLUME将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售PLUME。在PLUME从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 PLUME 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的PLUME余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 是代币上市前观察选择池，币安Alpha的项目在币安现货市场上架时，币安Alpha将不再展示该项目的资产。用户须完成身份认证（KYC）且来自符合条件的司法管辖区，才能参与HODLer空投；空投代币将在币安现货上线前自动转入至每位用户的现货钱包中；若非另行说明，如果有多个HODLer空投项目同时进行，用户在BNB保本赚币产品（定期和/或活期）和链上赚币产品中的BNB资产将分配到这些项目中；在币安借贷（活期利率）作为抵押的保本赚币BNB活期产品，将无法获得HODLer空投奖励；申购保本赚币产品的BNB资产，仍可享有常用的福利，例如：参与Launchpool和Megadrop资格以及VIP等级福利；HODLer空投奖励计算将支持币安无私钥钱包中的质押 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 17:36注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第32期项目 – Plume (PLUME), 一个为现实世界资产 (RWA) 构建的与 EVM 兼容的区块链。2025年07月24日08:00至2025年07月28日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）上市PLUME，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 PLUME充值通道将于2025年08月18日19:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 PLUME (LINK) ，但PLUME现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。PLUME HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Plume (PLUME)创世代币总供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME 代币最大供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME HODLer空投代币总量：150,000,000 PLUME（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外25,000,000 PLUME 将在现货上市后用于市场活动，另有 100,000,000 PLUME 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：2,650,000,000 PLUME（占代币最大供应量的 26.50% ）智能合约/网络详情：Plume浏览器以太坊 (0x4C1746A800D224393fE2470C70A35717eD4eA5F1)上币费：0研究报告：Plume (PLUME)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转PLUME到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，PLUME将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售PLUME。在PLUME从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 PLUME 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的PLUME余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 是代币上市前观察选择池，币安Alpha的项目在币安现货市场上架时，币安Alpha将不再展示该项目的资产。用户须完成身份认证（KYC）且来自符合条件的司法管辖区，才能参与HODLer空投；空投代币将在币安现货上线前自动转入至每位用户的现货钱包中；若非另行说明，如果有多个HODLer空投项目同时进行，用户在BNB保本赚币产品（定期和/或活期）和链上赚币产品中的BNB资产将分配到这些项目中；在币安借贷（活期利率）作为抵押的保本赚币BNB活期产品，将无法获得HODLer空投奖励；申购保本赚币产品的BNB资产，仍可享有常用的福利，例如：参与Launchpool和Megadrop资格以及VIP等级福利；HODLer空投奖励计算将支持币安无私钥钱包中的质押 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 17:36注意：在非币安平台交易上述代币前，请您自行研究以避免任何欺诈行为并确保您的资产安全。这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：币安HODLer空投现已上线第32期项目 – Plume (PLUME), 一个为现实世界资产 (RWA) 构建的与 EVM 兼容的区块链。2025年07月24日08:00至2025年07月28日07:59（东八区时间）期间，使用BNB申购保本赚币(定期和/或活期)或链上赚币产品的用户，将获得空投分配。HODLer空投信息预计将在24小时内上线，新代币将在交易开始前至少 1 小时分发至用户的现货钱包。币安将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）上市PLUME，并开通对USDT、USDC、BNB、FDUSD和TRY的交易对，适用种子标签交易规则。 PLUME充值通道将于2025年08月18日19:30（东八区时间）开放。*请注意，用户现在可以在Binance Alpha市场交易 PLUME (LINK) ，但PLUME现货交易开始后，币安Alpha将不会继续展示相关资产，且现货交易后的交易量不会算到Alpha积分。PLUME HODLer空投详情：代币名称：Plume (PLUME)创世代币总供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME 代币最大供应量：10,000,000,000 PLUME HODLer空投代币总量：150,000,000 PLUME（代币最大总供应量的 1.50%）额外25,000,000 PLUME 将在现货上市后用于市场活动，另有 100,000,000 PLUME 将在上市6个月后用于市场活动；详细规则将另行公告在币安上市时的流通供应量：2,650,000,000 PLUME（占代币最大供应量的 26.50% ）智能合约/网络详情：Plume浏览器以太坊 (0x4C1746A800D224393fE2470C70A35717eD4eA5F1)上币费：0研究报告：Plume (PLUME)（研报将于该公告四十八小时内上线）BNB持仓硬顶：单个用户BNB平均持仓数量 / BNB总平均持仓数量*100% ≤ 4%，（若持仓占比大于4%，则BNB持仓比例将按4%计算）HODLer空投介绍 币安HODLer空投根据用户的BNB持仓量进行历史快照，并为BNB持有者奖励代币空投。通过使用BNB申购保本赚币（定期和/或活期）产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投（以及Launchpool和Megadrop奖励）。通过使用BNB申购链上赚币产品，用户将自动有资格获得HODLer空投以及Launchpool奖励。与其它需要持续操作的赚币方式不同，HODLer空投通过回溯的形式奖励用户，提供更为简单的额外赚币方法。使用BNB申购保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品，用户即可自动获得代币奖励。如何从HODLer空投中获益前往【理财】页面搜索BNB；使用BNB持仓申购保本赚币产品（活期和/或定期）或链上赚币产品；币安将每小时对用户的BNB持仓量和总池持仓随机进行多次快照，以计算用户在保本赚币产品和链上赚币产品中的每小时平均持仓。币安将在本公告发布后的随机时间段，通过对用户BNB持仓量的历史快照来计算用户奖励；例如：2024年06月11日HODLer空投奖励计算，可能会使用2024年06月01日至2024年06月07日期间，用户BNB持仓量快照作为参考。符合条件的用户将在HODLer空投宣布后的24小时内，在其现货钱包中收到HODLer空投奖励。立即通过币安理财申购BNB！项目链接：官网白皮书X条款和条件：币安 Alpha 用户需注意：用户可以从Alpha账户划转PLUME到现货账户。当币安现货交易开启时，PLUME将从币安Alpha下架。用户仍然可以通过 币安Alpha继续出售PLUME。在PLUME从币安Alpha下架后，用户仍然可以在他们的Alpha账户中查看 PLUME 余额，并将其划转到现货账户以继续在币安现货进行交易。币安将在现货上币后的24小时内，把用户的PLUME余额从Alpha账户批量划转到用户的现货账户。币安Alpha 小时内启用。针对目前已在运行中的现货跟单投资组合，用户可以通过【现货跟单设置】-【个人交易对偏好】启用新的交易对；参与HODLer空投需根据用户居住的国家或地区要求，以满足参与资格；币安保留取消任何篡改币安程序代码或使用其他软件干扰币安程序代码运行的参与者资格的权利；用户需要来自符合条件的司法管辖区才能参与HODLer空投。目前，居住在以下国家或地区的用户将无法通过申购BNB保本赚币产品或链上赚币产品参与：澳大利亚、加拿大、古巴、克里米亚地区、塞浦路斯、顿涅茨克、香港、伊朗、日本、哈萨克斯坦、卢甘斯克、新西兰、荷兰、朝鲜、俄罗斯、英国、美国及其领土美属萨摩亚、关岛、波多黎各、北马里亚纳群岛和美属维尔京群岛）、乌克兰任何非政府控制地区。受限制国家或地区列表将可能随着法律、监管及其它因素的改变而定期更新；英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章关于币安现货新增交易对及交易机器人服务的公告 22:30PLUME/USDC0.08-0.1238%PLUME/USDT0.08+0.0000%这是一般性公告，此处提及的产品和服务可能不适用于您所在的地区。亲爱的用户：为给用户提供更丰富的选择，币安理财、一键买币、闪兑交易平台和杠杆将按照以下列出的时间线上线Plume（PLUME），邀您体验！币安理财PLUME保本赚币活期产品将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）上线币安保本赚币平台并开放申购。注：Plume（PLUME）是上線幣安HODLer空投的項目，幣安HODLer空投根據用戶的BNB保本賺幣或BNB鏈上賺幣持倉量進行歷史快照，並為BNB持有者獎勵代幣空投。用戶申購BNB保本賺幣（活期或定期產品）或BNB鏈上賺幣將自動有資格獲得HODLer空投獎勵。一键买币&卖币用户可以通过“一键买币”页面使用信用卡/借记卡、Google Pay、Apple Pay、Revolut购买PLUME或使用钱包余额购买/出售PLUME。PLUME在币安现货上线后一小时内，即可在一键买币开始交易。闪兑交易平台PLUME在币安现货上线后一小时内，用户可将PLUME兑换成BTC、USDT或闪兑交易平台支持的其他代币，兑换免手续费。币安杠杆币安全仓、逐仓杠杆将于2025年08月18日23:00（东八区时间）新增PLUME可借资产，以及PLUME/USDT 和 PLUME/USDC全仓、逐仓杠杆交易对。注：请注意，新上市代币往往波动较大，我们鼓励用户在交易此类代币时采取更多风险管理策略；币安杠杆支持交易的资产的额度、质押率、利率会根据市场情况随时调整，以杠杆数据页面为准。帮助文档：如何在币安使用信用卡/借记卡购买加密货币如何使用币安闪兑如何杠杆做空-高卖低买如何杠杆做多-低买高卖 注：英文原版公告与翻译版本可能存在差异。若有任何差异，请参照英文原版以获取最新或最准确的信息。感谢您对币安的支持！币安团队2025年08月18日点击立即下载iPhone或Android版APP币安社群DiscordFacebookX华语X币安历来重视合规义务，始终严格遵守各地监管机构相关要求，并请您遵守所在国家或地区的相关法律法规。币安保留随时全权酌情因任何理由修改、变更或取消此公告的权利，无需事先通知。免责声明：数字资产价格具有高市场风险和价格波动性。您的投资价值可能会有所波动，也可能损失投资金额。您将自行为您的投资决策负全责，币安不对任何可能产生的损失负责。过去的业绩亦不构成未来业绩的可靠预测指标。您应只投资熟悉的产品并了解相关风险。您应详细考虑自身的投资经验、财务状况、投资目标和风险承受能力，并在进行任何投资前咨询独立财务顾问。本文不应被视为财务建议。详情请参阅币安使用条款和风险警示。分享最新发布文章DORA交易竞赛：交易DORA（DORA），分享73万美元等值奖励币安合约将上线WLFIUSDT column7: TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 下架通知
column9:
Bybit 平台即将下架 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 交易对，今后将不再支持上述资产。公告发布日期:2025-08-15T10:00:00.000Z
Bybit 平台即将下架 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 交易对，今后将不再支持上述资产。现货• 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，Bybit 现货交易平台不再支持 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 现货交易对，所有订单都将自动移除。闪兑• 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，Bybit 闪兑平台将下架 TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 代币。充值• 2025 年 8 月 21 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，不再支持 TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 充值。交易对下架后您仍可提走资产。提币仍正常开放，但建议您尽快提币，以便有效管理您的资产。为更好地管理您的资产，请参考具体时间安排。如果您上述交易对有运行中的现货网格机器人或定投机器人，请在 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 之前将其关闭。否则，系统将自动关闭这些机器人。*您可点击[此处](https://www.bybit.com/zh-MY/help-center/article/Bybit-Token-Management-Rules)查看 Bybit 代币管理规则。感谢您一直以来的支持。

Bybit 平台即将下架 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 交易对，今后将不再支持上述资产。现货• 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，Bybit 现货交易平台不再支持 TGT/USDT、GST/USDT、NLK/USDT 和 FIRE/USDT 现货交易对，所有订单都将自动移除。闪兑• 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，Bybit 闪兑平台将下架 TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 代币。充值• 2025 年 8 月 21 日 8:00 (UTC) 后，不再支持 TGT、GST、NLK 和 FIRE 充值。交易对下架后您仍可提走资产。提币仍正常开放，但建议您尽快提币，以便有效管理您的资产。为更好地管理您的资产，请参考具体时间安排。如果您上述交易对有运行中的现货网格机器人或定投机器人，请在 2025 年 8 月 22 日 8:00 (UTC) 之前将其关闭。否则，系统将自动关闭这些机器人。*您可点击[此处](https://www.bybit.com/zh-MY/help-center/article/Bybit-Token-Management-Rules)查看 Bybit 代币管理规则。感谢您一直以来的支持。

column7: BloFin to Delist a Batch of USDT-M Perpetual Contracts
column9:
Dear BloFin users,
To maintain a high-quality trading market and meet a high level of standard and industry requirements, BloFin expects to delist a batch of USDT-M Perpetual Contracts based on our periodic token reviews. Details are as follows.
Delisting Pairs:
Delisting Time
7:00 UTC, August 18, 2025
7:00 UTC, August 21, 2025
Contract Pairs
DUSDT
SENDUSDT
QUICKUSDT
SCRTUSDT
HIVEUSDT
ALUUSDT
ROAMUSDT
DOLOUSDT
SOSOUSDT
PORT3USDT
NXPCUSDT
LAUNCHCOINUSDT
XIONUSDT
GIGAUSDT
CLOUDUSDT
DUCKUSDT
HPOS10lUSDT
DMCUSDT
TANSSIUSDT
10000COQUSDT
Delisting Details:
Users are not allowed to open new positions for the aforementioned contracts starting from this announcement. Reduce-only orders for closing positions are supported.
All active and conditional orders for the above-mentioned perpetual contracts will be canceled at the delisting time.
BloFin Futures will close all positions and conduct an automatic settlement on the above-mentioned perpetual contracts at the delisting time.
Please note:
This delisting only affects BloFin contract products (including contract copy trading).
The aforementioned contracts will be delisted after the settlement is complete. Users are advised to close any open positions prior to the delisting time to avoid automatic settlement.
To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism.
Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance.
Thanks for your support!
BloFin Team
Aug 15, 2025
Find us on
X (Twitter)
Instagram
Telegram
Discord
Youtube
BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice.
Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.

Please note:
This delisting only affects BloFin contract products (including contract copy trading).
The aforementioned contracts will be delisted after the settlement is complete. Users are advised to close any open positions prior to the delisting time to avoid automatic settlement.
To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism.
Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance.
Thanks for your support!

To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism.
Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance.

Dear BloFin users, To maintain a high-quality trading market and meet a high level of standard and industry requirements, BloFin expects to delist the 1000000PEIPEIUSDT Perpetual Contract at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 15, 2025 based on our periodic token reviews. Delisting details:
Users are not allowed to open new positions for the aforementioned contract starting from this announcement. Reduce-only orders for closing positions are supported.
All active and conditional orders for the above-mentioned perpetual contract will be canceled at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 15, 2025.
BloFin Futures will close all positions and conduct an automatic settlement on the above-mentioned perpetual contract at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 15, 2025.
Please note:
This delisting only affects BloFin contract products (including contract copy trading).
The aforementioned contracts will be delisted after the settlement is complete. Users are advised to close any open positions prior to the delisting time to avoid automatic settlement.
To safeguard users and mitigate potential risks in highly volatile market conditions, BloFin Futures may undertake additional protective measures for the aforementioned contracts without prior notice, including but not limited to adjusting the maximum leverage value, position value, and maintenance margin in each margin tier; updating funding rates (such as the interest rate and capped funding rate); changing the constituents of the price index, and updating the Mark Price with the Last Price Protected mechanism.
Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 14, 2025 Find us on

column7: BloFin Will List OVL/USDT for Spot Trading (2025-08-14)
column9: Dear BloFin users, To extend the range of trading options available on BloFin Spot and improve users' trading experience, BloFin will list the $OVL(Overlay) token on our spot trading markets. The listing schedule is as follows:Deposits: 09:00 (UTC) on August 14, 2025Spot trading: 09:30 (UTC) on August 14, 2025Withdrawals: 09:30 (UTC) on August 15, 2025Further Reading:BloFin Spot Trading FeeBloFin Spot Trading Guide Please note:To prevent potential losses, please ensure the selected chain or network on BloFin matches the one used for your withdrawal or deposit.To align with market liquidity, BloFin may automatically adjust spot trading parameters. Please refer to the trading page for the most accurate information.The listing schedule in the announcement is for reference only. The actual deposit/ trading/ withdrawal time shall prevail. For any questions, please contact our online support. About OVL:Overlay is a protocol to long/short any scalar, non-manipulable and unpredictable data stream. Users lock the native token OV to long/short a particular market, and smart contract mints/burns OV based on the success of the position. The protocol has been launched on mainnet in a sandboxed environment -what they called Litter Box, with less than 20,000 OV in circulation.X LinkOfficial Website To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the app from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support!BloFin TeamAugust 14 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. column7: BloFin Spot Will Delist VADER, BOBO, SPICE, RIZ and LKI
column9:
Dear BloFin Users, To maintain a robust spot trading environment, BloFin conducts periodic reviews of all listed spot trading pairs. Our top priority is providing the best services and protections for our users while staying adaptable to changing market conditions. Based on our latest review, BloFin will remove the VADER/USDT, BOBO/USDT, SPICE/USDT, RIZ/USDT and LKI/USDT spot trading pairs. Delisting details are as follows:
Spot Trading: All trades and pending orders for the above-mentioned pairs will be automatically removed and canceled at 07:00 (UTC) on Aug 19, 2025. Users are strongly advised to update or cancel their orders prior to the termination of Spot Trading services to avoid any potential losses.
Deposits: We will close deposits for the above-mentioned spots at 07:30 (UTC) on Aug 19, 2025, 2025. Please manage your assets promptly.
Withdrawals: We will close withdrawals for the above-mentioned spots at 07:00 (UTC) on Oct 19, 2025. Please ensure that you leave sufficient time for your assets to be fully processed prior to this time.
Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Please contact our customer support team at support@blofin.com for assistance if you have any questions or concerns regarding this delisting. Thanks for your support and understanding! BloFin TeamAug 14, 2025 Find us on

column7: Bitunix to Delist Multiple Trading Pairs from Spot Market (08-15-2025)
column9:
Dear Users,
To better protect user rights and interests, Bitunix continues to improve internal controls, upgrade audit standards, and strengthen comprehensive risk control mechanisms. Bitunix will delist certain tokens and adjust trading pairs in accordance with platform regulations. After internal review, the following tokens have shown abnormal performance, low liquidity, or lack of active development. As a result, Bitunix will proceed with delisting and risk control actions. At the same time, Bitunix will regularly optimize relevant rules and processes to ensure a healthier trading environment for listed projects. These changes include suspending spot trading and Convert features for the affected tokens.
Based on the criteria above, Bitunix will delist AIT Protocol (AIT), Arowana (ARW), Celsius (CEL), Pain (PAIN), VGX Token (VGX) on August 15, 2025.
To avoid unnecessary losses or disruptions, please complete any related operations within the specified time frame. We recommend that you take necessary action in advance, such as converting any remaining balances or cancelling active orders.
Deposit and Withdrawal
Deposit of the tokens: suspended.
Withdrawal Suspension: September 15, 2025, 09:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading
Bitunix will delist the following spot trading pairs on August 15, 2025, at 09:00 (UTC): AIT/USDT, ARW/USDT, CEL/USDT, PAIN/USDT, VGX/USDT If users have any open orders for these trading pairs before delisting, they will be cancelled automatically.
Convert
Bitunix Convert will disable the convert for the above-mentioned tokens on August 15, 2025, at 09:00 (UTC). At the same time, small balance conversion to USDT for these tokens will also be removed. We recommend that users convert their small balances in advance.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the adjustment of currency and transaction pairs. If you encounter any problems during the process, please contact us via our live chat or email us at support@bitunix.com.
Thank you for your support!
The Bitunix Team
August 15, 2025
Follow Bitunix on social media:
X: https://x.com/bitunixofficial
Telegram: https://t.me/bitunixglobal
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitunix
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitunixofficial
*Risk Warning:
The cryptocurrency market is available worldwide 24 x 7 for trading with no market close or open times. Please do your own risk assessment when deciding how to invest in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to screen all projects before they come to market. However, even with the best due diligence, there are still possible risks when investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses.

column7: MKRUSDT 永续合约下架
column9:
Bybit will 将于 2025 年 8 月 18 日9:00 UTC 下架 MKRUSDT 永续合约。公告发布日期:2025-08-12T09:00:32.000Z


注：- MKRUSDT 永续合约即将下架，不再支持交易。- MKRUSDT 永续合约的所有活动单和条件单都将自动取消。- MKRUSDT 永续合约中的任何未平仓位都将自动平仓。平仓价格基于下架前 30 分钟的平均指数价格。- MKRUSDT 永续合约即将下架，不再支持交易机器人。- MKRUSDT 永续合约的所有跟单交易未成交订单都将自动取消。如有任何疑问，欢迎请随时联系[客服团队](https://www.bybit.com/zh-MY/help-center/s/webform)。感谢您一直以来的支持。
